Fake ID is an Android vulnerability that allows applications to impersonate other applications by copying their identity that can then be used for malicious purposes. Allows for malicious apps to impersonate other applications by copying their identity – their digital certificate(s) used to cryptographically sign the application package (APK file) – and combining it with their own signature making a chain whereby the parent signature (also known as the “issuer”) can be used to verify the child signatures. The Fake ID vulnerability, is present in most Android versions 2.1 and above. Depending on the hardware manufacturer and the version of Android running on your device you may be vulnerable to one or more of more privileged attack vectors as described by BlueBox who discovered the vulnerability and of course, given this problem relates to chains of certificates, a hacker could chose to include many certificates to cover all of these options, and more, in their specifically crafted malware. McAfee Fake ID Detector enables you to quickly discover if your applications contain the exploit. Privacy Protection Malicious http://blogs.mcafee.com/mcafee-labs/beware-impostor-android-apps
release_text: Fake ID or FakeID Scanner is a security product that help in protecting your privacy.

description: Root File Manager is the best File Explorer for rooted phones. You can explore all of Android's file systems and take control of your rooted device. It allows you to browse your SD card, create directories, rename, copy, move, and delete files. Features: * Cut, copy and paste folders and files. * Compress and decompress (extract) files (ZIP) * Change file permissions and ownership * Create and delete files and directories * Rename folders and files * Thumbnail for photo and picture files * Support folder shortcut on Favorites for easily access * Sort by name, size or last modified * Send and share files * Open files with other apps * Support many languages: English, French, Spanish, etc. * The best (optimized) resolution and theme for each system version: Kitkat, Jelly Bean, Ice Cream Sandwich, Gingerbread, Froyo, Eclair

Transmission GUI is a feature rich µTorrent-like front-end to remotely control a Transmission Bit-Torrent client daemon via its RPC protocol. Transmission GUI is faster and has more functionality than the built-in Transmission web interface. It provides almost all available functions supported by Transmission RPC protocol. Short features list: - Fastest data retrival speed - SSL connection support - Multiple hosts support - Download information Widget: displays torrents processing progress and speeds - Download complete notifications - Select files when adding new torrent - File browser feature when adding local torrents - Browse folders on server for data location - Flexible torrent filter - Chose fields to display - Simple speed throttle control - Group operations with torrent and files - Add torrent by URL, magnet link or file - Set torrents and files priority - Chose files to download/skip - Automatic refresh - Full torrent properties report - UTF-8 support in file names and filter Pro version features: - Trackers control: add, delete, sort, group operations - Torrent properties control - Full Transmission options control - Sorting of torrents and files by any field - Torrents queue control - Move torrent(s) data to other location - Transmission statistics report
release_text: -Fixed blocking issue “No such file or Directory” when default Download dir is not accessible -Some interface improvements

description: SpeedView is an advanced speedometer application that uses the phone's built-in GPS system to show your current, maximum and average speed, as well as the direction, total distance, and time traveled. Suitable for running, car driving, biking, or hiking. • High accuracy GPS-based speedometer that is more accurate than the one in your car. • Linear compass Shows your current direction of travel. A compass mode is also available. • HUD mode Mirrors the numbers so you can place your phone on your car's dashboard and see the speed reflected in the front glass. You can check out this video to see how it works: http://youtu.be/rzda7CQ-ZAU • Speed graph Displays a graph chart covering the last several minutes. • Speed warning You can set the speed limits for three different types of roads so that when you go too fast a visual alert or sound will notify you. • Display units Supports units such as miles, kilometers, and nautical miles. • GPX track export Enables you to save your current track to the SD card or email it to someone. The GPX format is supported by Google Earth and many other programs: http://www.topografix.com/gpx_resources.asp • Background mode You can minimize the program and keep it running in the background. It will work as usual and even notify you when you exceed the speed limit. Please note that the accuracy of GPS measurements is affected by a number of factors including atmospheric conditions, obstructions and the visibility of satellites. We use Sense360, a third party technology provider, to help us better understand how our users use SpeedView and their devices. SpeedView sends raw sensor data generated by your device to Sense360. This sensor data may include information from GPS receivers, accelerometers, gyroscopes, and other sensors, which may allow Sense360 to determine, for example, your device’s location, acceleration, and orientation. Sense360 may use this data to send us analytic reports regarding how our users are using SpeedView and their devices, or for marketing purposes. To learn more, please visit Sense360’s privacy policy, available at: http://sense360.com/privacy-policy.html . This version is ad-supported. A paid version without ads and more features is also available. If you have any questions or comments, feel free to post them on our blog: http://blog.codesector.com/

Money Log app helps you keep track of you Accounts, Income, Expenses, Bills, Budget and manage your money more effectively. Money Log gives all information to manage your expenses effectively like current balance in individual accounts and to all accounts balance, Shows Incomes and Expenses made month wise, Reminds you about pending bills, Shows Budget set,Expenses made and Remaining budget in month wise. The app also gives you a graphical overview of the expenses, incomes and budget. Sync Expenses and Incomes between Android and IOS Devices Main features: -- See All Account’s balance when the app starts up. -- Check all Transactions made from particular Account. -- Setup repeating entries for income, expense and bills. -- Unlimited Accounts. -- 60+ Currency Symbols -- Bills Reminder. -- Optimized to Tablets -- Manage multiple accounts and make transfers between the accounts. -- Bills in Calendar view with perfect markers showing bill status. -- Widget showing accounts balance and bills overview. -- No registration!! --Add and edit Categories with images. -- Password Protection. -- Track Transactions of Individual Accounts or All Accounts -- Check Current Balance of required Accounts Only. -- Check number of times category used in expenses or incomes in Statistics -- Easy access. -- Internet connection required for Currency Converter only. -- The overview of your expenses, income and upcoming bills . -- Use the search to look for specific expenses and incomes between dates. -- Multiple currencies. -- By Long Click on Transaction you can create delete,edit,duplicate or move transaction from one account to another account. -- Set budget for categories and always stay within budget. -- See Average Income/Expense per Day in Statistics -- See Statistics of Custom Selected Multiple Accounts. -- Visualise the statistics graph and see where your money has gone by categorising all incomes and expenses, Payees, Monthly Income, Monthly Expense, Budget vs Expense, Income vs Expense, Income vs Expense vs Budget, Incomes and Expenses between Accounts.. -- Add further categories to get a better overview of your expenses. -- Unlimited records -- Upload backup to Dropbox. -- Restore backup from Dropbox. -- Sync Expenses and Incomes between multiple devices. -- Use the built-in calculator to quickly calculate amounts. -- Export to .CSV,.XLS. -- Create backup so you never lose your data. description: How about adding free sounds fun to your Android with the cool ringtones from the past? Download this Old Phone Ringtones app. Even though we live in the 21st century, there is nothing wrong with having old telephone rings.When you mention old phones, everyone remembers the good old times so it`s no wonder these ringtones for Android phone are in fact retro ringtones. Set these free tones as ringtones or as message sounds or even better - as an alarm. Set timer and other notification sounds, or send old telephone ringtones by email or share on social networks. It was not so long ago when we all had a rotary phone which was a symbol of higher class. Those were other times followed by classic phones, so by downloading this Android app, you can have the sounds of Bell Phone, Antique telephone rings, Double Bell and a lot more. Old phone ringtones free seem to be the best way of showing off your phone. In the modern age of Android, we have many different melody sounds, but ringtones old phone will evoke many valuable memories. Classical ringtones are perfect for those who want to evoke nostalgic memories of the antique phone tones. If you want old phone ringtones to take you down the memory lane, we are bringing ringtones for free to download. Find your favorite in the collection of the best ringtones and do not miss a call ever again. Old Phone Ringtones Features: - Set as ringtone, assign to contacts - Set as alarm and timer sound - Set as SMS ringtone - Set as widget - Share on social networks or email sounds License: Sounds used in Old Phone Ringtones app are under Public Domain or Creative Commons license, credited in the app, where appropriate. For any questions or concerns regarding license, please contact us at bluewavesapps@gmail.com . Drive the lorry of this truck simulator and finish the missions before you run out of fuel! (Real truck interior camera) Features of this Truck Simulator: -truck loading with: -forklift -wood grabber -bulldozer -tow truck -dirt road truck -different type of cargo -big truck simulator maps -trucks with and without trailer -interior camera -steering sensitivity -cool and smooth graphics -traffic cars -tractor driving -realistic truck and traffic damage -fuel system with gas stations -realistic truck and cargo physics -army truck (war missions) and explosive mines on the road -And many more! 2 new maps coming soon for this truck simulator!

*** PLAY FRENCH BELOTE ON YOUR ANDROID SMARTPHONE OR TABLET ! *** Play the popular French Belote card game, against opponents simulated by an high-level artificial intelligence. All official rules and many variants are handled : - Play with or without declarations. - Play with No Trumps and All Trumps. *** HD GRAPHICS *** Easy to use, the game is very fast and responsive, with card animation for a more realistic gameplay, and hd graphics. *** AN HIGH-LEVEL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE *** Your opponents and teammates are simulated by an high-level artificial intelligence, that knows the common strategies used in french belote card game. Therefore the game is very realistic, close to game with real players, and the challenge is high. *** A CUSTOMIZABLE APPLICATION *** - Many options to customize the rules. - Change the player's name. - Change the speed of the game. - Play automatically. - Direction on play. - Visual theme. - And many more... *** AN APPLICATION THAT WILL MAKE YOU BECOME BETTER *** A section with statistics is included in the application, allowing you to monitor the evolution of our performances. For beginners, rules of French Belote are also included into the application. Finally, you can at the end of the round see all the tricks, and replay the round if you want, to train and try new strategies. For any question regarding the application : support.belote@eryodsoft.com Have fun playing Belote !

Levels and dimensions are fascinating, aren't they? That is why we prepared a new, challenging and addictive puzzle game "Blocks: Levels". Now our blocks vary in size, shape and color. When You combine shape and size of the tiles, You may deduce its level. We won't give You the exact recipe for the Level puzzle. Well OK, a little hint: there are three levels of the blocks. "Blocks: Levels" provides a brilliant fun for children and adults. Basic principle of this puzzle game is simple: You have to remove blocks of the same color, shape and size from the board. There are some restrictions however: You may remove only group of tiles of the same color, shape and size that are connected to each other vertically or horizontally. Group of tiles has to consist of at least three blocks of the same kind. Some other things You have to know before You play this awesome game: One tile of the next level appears in place of the removed blocks. After removing the tiles of the highest level there is a bonus - a handful of gold coins, which gives You 500 bonus points! "Blocks: Levels" is the the most difficult puzzle game made by us by now. How many points will You gain? Can You solve the mystery of Levels? Download "Blocks: Levels" for free and have fun!

description: © Health Education Thames Valley and Health Education Wessex Injecting medicines is a high-risk area of clinical practice and one that information staff receive many requests for help with, especially from nurses. This app will teach you about medicines that can be safely injected together. The app is suitable for all healthcare staff, in particular: • nurses who administer injections • nurses in training • ward-based pharmacists in training. Learn to make yourself safer and learn about injection compatibility. The app takes about 40 minutes to complete. Along the way you’ll meet Nurse Taylor and some of her colleagues and patients. These characters feature in informative animations and scenarios, along with practise questions throughout the app. PLEASE NOTE: you will need approximately 52 Mb for the App and and 11Mb for Adobe Air to be installed in your device in order to use the Flash animations and video content in this App. You will automatically be prompted to install Adobe Air if not already on your device. Keywords: NHS,Injectable,injection,medicine,medicines,compatibility,compatible,incompatible,incompatibility,drugs,drug,administer,inject,injecting,pharmacy,pharmacist, Epic

description: 네이버 뮤직앱으로 언제 어디서나 원하는 모든 곡을 바로 즐기세요! 네이버뮤직의 최신앨범, Top100, 추천음악, 뮤직비디오 등을 모두 즐길 수 있으며 PC에서 만들어놓은 내 리스트와 좋아요한 음악까지 모두 손쉽게 사용 가능합니다. 네이버앱에서 ‘음악검색’했던 곡들도 네이버뮤직앱 ‘음악검색 히스토리’에서 확인할 수 있습니다. 네이버뮤직 이용권을 보유하면 스트리밍 뿐만 아니라, 이용권 종류에 따라 노래끊김 현상이나 데이터 요금 부담이 없도록 안드로이드 폰에 다운받아 즐길 수 있습니다. 네이버뮤직의 자세한 기능이 더 궁금하신가요? JAMM : ‘재밍(Jamming)’은 ‘연주자들이 자발적으로 모여 즉흥 연주를 하며 즐기는’ 이라는 뜻을 가진 음악 용어로, 이용자들이 특정 태그에 어울리는 곡을 함께 추천하고 들으며 즐긴다는 의미의 ‘함께 만드는 플레이리스트’ 기능입니다. ‘태그 만들기’를 통해 누구나 새로운 태그를 만들고 다른 사람들과 공유할 수 있습니다. Top100 : 지금 가장 인기있는 최신곡을 Top100으로 만나세요. 무료음악: 매월 새롭게 공개되는 30곡을 '무료음악' 메뉴에서 무료로 스트리밍할 수 있습니다. 음악검색 : 지금 들리는 음악이 궁금할 때, 네이버뮤직앱을 켜고 홈에 있는 ‘음악인식’ 버튼을 누르세요. 마이뮤직 : ’좋아요’한 음악, 내리스트, 최근들은 음악, 구매했던 MP3를 재다운로드 할 수 있습니다. 저장한 음악 : 권리자의 요청에 따라 MP3로 구매한 음원이라도 앨범, 아티스트, 검색 페이지에서 재생하는 경우 스트리밍으로 재생됩니다. (‘저장한 음악’ 페이지에서 재생하면 MP3 음원으로 감상할 수 있습니다.) 매거진 : 오늘의 뮤직, 테마채널, 명예의 전당, 온 스테이지 등 네이버 뮤직이 추천하는 다양한 음악을 만날 수 있습니다. 이제 네이버 뮤직앱으로 언제 어디서나 원하는 모든곡을 바로 즐기세요! 앱 사용 중에 궁금하신 점 또는 문제가 발생한 경우, 네이버 뮤직 고객센터로 접속하여 궁금하신 점을 해결해 보세요. description: Get behind the wheel for Race Day in Umi City! With Team Umizoomi: Math Racer HD, your child can customize and race their own car while enjoying fun pit stop math challenges so they can learn as they play! Now your child can build and race Umiriffic Vehicles in Umi City. First, they’ll design and customize their very own race car in the Umi garage, or they can choose one of their favorites - UmiCar, Shark Car, Umi Taxi or Ninja Car. Kids control their car with a simple swipe as they race around the track collecting coins and avoiding obstacles. They’ll enjoy pit stop challenges that combine math curriculum with fun activities slike a tire or tuning up the engine. Kids will also earn trophies and decorative car decals after each race! Team Umizoomi: Math Racer HD fosters early math skills through an immersive number-based curriculum that includes: • Number identification • Counting and enumeration • Number comparisons • Early addition and subtraction • Number sequencing Each curricular activity is clearly defined and integrated into the app’s fun race car theme. From changing the oil to cleaning the windshield, kids will have hours of playtime as they successfully complete up to six different levels of difficulty. Download Team Umizoomi: Math Racer HD so your kids can start racing today! Team Umizoomi Math Racer HD collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. Kindergarten Word Play is a set of 250+ interactive exercises to teach kids about 250+ words. Phonics, images and spoken words create a complete learning experience in this app. Kindergarten Kids Word Play is for kids who know their ABCs and are now learning how those alphabets make words. • Word learning app with 250+ words • Match, Sight Words, Phonics and Spelling games • Images, spoken words and phonics sounds for a complete learning experience • No third-party ads and No data collection. The games are - * Match Connect the written word to it's image. Tap the image to hear the word. * Sight Words Learn sight words using a memory game. * Phonics Complete the word using the phonetic sound of the missing letter or letter combination. * Spelling Re-arrange the given letters into a word for the image. Tap the image to hear the word. Tap the empty spots to hear what letter goes there. Our Story When we looked for apps to help teach our kids, we couldn't find any that were good. One was just information text for the kids to learn by rote. Another was multiple-choice tests - just press buttons. A third had 2 sound-tracks and 4 animations running all at the same time. How was a kid supposed to focus? So, we designed and built them games - that teach in the way parents and teachers explain concepts, and engage in the way playing does.

Правила игры Виселица на русском языке: Необходимо угадать слово, для этого выбираем по одной букве из алфавитного ряда. Если буква, которую выбрали, есть в этом слове, то она автоматически запишется в том месте, где она располагается непосредственно в самом слове. Если же не угадали букву, то петля на виселице будет затягиваться все сильнее, пока человек не будет нарисован полностью. Всего можно сделать шесть попыток. Приложение Виселица - игра в слова содержит рекламу, что позволяет распространять его бесплатно. Rules of the game Hangman in Russian: You must guess the word, for this choose one letter of the alphabet series. If the letter, which was chosen, there is in this word, it is automatically written in the place where it is located directly in the word. If not guessed the letter, the loop on the gallows will be delayed more and more, until the person will be drawn completely. All you can do six attempts. Appendix Hangman - word game contains advertising that allows you to distribute it for free.

In this demo only the 2 first lessons are available: * Tenses: Present, Gerund, Participle * 300 words * Basic grammar * 30 useful phrases And the following features: * Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises. * Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made. The fun of this demo lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises. The full version comes with tons of content, while the content of this demo is rather limited. The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox. If you are serious about learning French, please give this demo a try.

description: Four Word Association - Hidden word association game. Unravel the hidden word! Exercise your brain, sharpen your mind, and exponentially improve your intuition. * 250 levels over 5 difficulty modes. * Intuitive controls. On the game board, you are given four clue words. Your job is to figure out the hidden word using word associations related to the clues. Word associations can be synonyms, antonyms, compound words, sound alike words, and any word describing the hidden word. If the four clue words are not enough to figure out the hidden word. You can use hints, to unravel a hint, tap on the hint cover to reveal another clue. As another clue the in-game keyboard contains the hidden word letters but shuffled. The keyboard keys also contains non-related letters to add to the challenge. Once you unravel the hidden word you level up!

Биология Комплекты материалов для подготовки к Государственной итоговой аттестации по биологии в новой форме (ГИА ) созданы специалистом ФИПИ, официальным разработчиком контрольно-измерительных материалов ГИА в 2015 году. Материалы для подготовки к ГИА по биологии рекомендованы ИСМО Российской Академии Образования для подготовки выпускников всех типов образовательных учреждений РФ к сдаче экзаменов в форме ГИА. В приложении есть типовые варианты экзаменационных работ 2015 года, которые сопровождаются инструкциями по выполнению работы и ответами ко всем заданиям. Ценным дополнением является подробный разбор выполнения заданий части С. Материалы предполагают два режима работы: 1. Режим «Экзамен» - условия выполнения заданий максимально приближены к реальной обстановке на экзамене. 2. Режим «Тестирование» - предполагает возможность тренироваться, исправлять ответы, сверять свои решения с правильными ответами. Выполнение всех заданий гарантирует выработку устойчивых навыков безошибочных действий на экзамене, решения заданий базового, повышенного и высокого уровней сложности. Учащийся, справившийся со всеми предлагаемыми заданиями, может с уверенностью считать себя готовым к ГИА по биологии. Предлагаемые материалы избавят Вас от необходимости покупать множество книг и искать дополнительную информацию в Интернете! Компании «Экзамен-Медиа» очень важно Ваше мнение о представленных учебных материалах! Мы ждем Ваших замечаний и отзывов о нашей работе и будем рады выполнить Ваши пожелания. + Полностью обновлено содержание экзаменационных работ. + Изменилась структура работы. + Изменилась система оценивания заданий. + Изменилось количество заданий и порядок их нумерации. + Оформление приведено в соответствие с новым содержанием. Biology Kits to prepare for the state final examination in biology in a new form (DPA) established specialist FIPI, official developer of test materials GIA in 2015. Materials for the preparation of the DPA in biology recommended Ismo Russian Academy of Education to prepare graduates of all types of educational institutions of the Russian Federation for exams in the form of the DPA. The application has typical embodiments of the examination papers of 2015, which are accompanied by instructions for the implementation of the work and answers to all assignments. Is a valuable addition to a detailed analysis of the performance of tasks C.  Materials suggest two modes of operation: 1. Mode "Exam" - terms of assignments as close to the real situation on the exam. 2. Mode "Testing" - an opportunity to train, correct answers, compare their solutions with the correct answers. Performing all tasks guarantee an error-free sustainable skills in the exam solutions jobs base, enhanced, or high levels of complexity. Student cope with all the proposed assignment may, with the confidently consider themselves ready for the DPA in biology. Suggested materials save you from having to buy a lot books and look for more information on the Web! Of "Exam-Media" is very important to an opinion on education materials! We welcome your comments and feedback about our work and we happy to fulfill your wishes. + Fully updated contents of the examination papers. + Changed the structure of the work. + Modify job evaluation system. + Modify the number of jobs and the order of their numbering. + Making brought into line with the new content.

CaroO Free Driving Recorder update with full features of PRO version! You can use 100 times freely with this new version and if expired, you can purchase PRO version or reinstall this free version again after deleting it first. If you want to use the old version, please visit CaroO user service channel on Facebook or Google+. CaroO Free Driving Recorder is a free and lite version of CaroO Pro Driving Recorder which supports full pack of features including video dashcam with collision detection, driving track recorder with GPS function, and car-diagnosis and monitoring with OBD-II device. You can use video event recorder function and car-monitoring function separately or together. Experience the stable background operation as well as no gaps between recorded files on Android 4.1 or higher devices! - Video dashcam supporting resolution and quality control up to full HD (1920x1080), - Camera exposure and focus control (depending on capabilities of phones), - Auto file deletion for normal/emergency video, - Emergency report via SMS, call and YouTube upload, - Car monitoring with connection of ELM327 compatible OBD dongles, - RPM, Speed, Battery voltage, coolant temperature, Baro pressure, and many more data (depending on cars), - Fuel-cut, eco-drive level, harsh acceleration/brake, idling indicator, - Auto launch and termination options, - Co-working with Android Wear devices for notification and control We recommend smartphones with Android 4.0 or higher, but most smartphones with Android 2.2 or higher are supported too. Android 2.2 or lower devices will not be officially supported from CaroO v2.3.0. Before your purchase, please use the free version, CaroO Free Driving Recorder, in advance. If you have any problems or difficulties to use this app, please use the log button on the main screen and send log files to us. You can find a user manual of CaroO at the following link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9VZrEUr0oBGMlhnd3ZWZFBrS0U/view?usp=sharing And you could also get some helpful information by visiting Facebook page or Google+ user community. http://www.facebook.com/CarooProDrivingRecorder https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/114617914804645646011

description: Lemonade Stand is a classic game where you purchase ingredients, set the recipe and price, and sell lemonade to try to make a profit. Lemonade Stand allows you to control every aspect of your lemonade business. If you can increase customer satisfaction, more and more customers will come to your lemonade stand. Each of your days in a 30-day game of Lemonade Stand will follow this pattern: * Purchase supplies. * Set the price per cup of lemonade. * Set the lemonade recipe. * Use Star Power to advertise your lemonade business. * Simulate the day to see how you did. Lemons, Sugar, and Ice can spoil at different rates, so purchase only as much as you think you'll need, but don't run out or your customer satisfaction will plummet. Lemonade is made by the pitcher, so you'll set your recipe accordingly. Make sure you try different recipes to perfect the lemonade taste for your customers! Be sure to check the weather forecast for each day, as weather affects the number of customers you'll likely have. Rent an umbrella with star power to mitigate against the affects of rain! And don't serve ice-cold lemonade on a cold day. This game is integrated with Google Play Game Services to allow you to compare your high scores with others, and also to track your achievements.

Spot the differences game. This is a game for the whole family. Spot the differences is a great puzzle game to test your observation . Compare 2 images and find ,search and discover 5 differences between the photo pair. That is the goal. Try the most loved game on Android. Improve your observation skills; exercise your brain while playing this deluxe game. Game features: ★ Lot's of Photo pairs ★ Hint system ★ High Score board ★ Share on social networks ★ Save to SD on Froyo + ★ Free game How to Play You are provided with 2 pictures pair. The picture pair will appear to be much similar to each other but they aren’t they are hidden. You gotta exercise your search and observation and spot the difference between the pair .Just tap on the point where you observe the difference. If you tap at the wrong position then your time would be reduced. To set high scores, finish the levels faster. If you are stuck then use a maximum of 3 hints by pressing the magnifier. Score more and win big on the board game which is rated high. Detect and Search. Score more than your friends and share the winning. Also remember to check out our other find the difference games, puzzles & reader apps. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter or Google+ and please keep emailing us with any questions or feedback! Copyright © MadRabbit Studio 2013

SMSToExcel is a simple way to backup and restore your phone’s text messages. you can view your text messages in any Excel-compatible application, such as OfficeSuite, QuickOffice or Kingsoft Office on the phone/tablet. or MS Excel, OpenOffice.org, or Numbers on the computer. - Backup SMS Messages in Excel 97-2003 format. - Choose a scheduled time to automatically backup. - Option to backup only the messages sent to/from the person in your phone’s contacts list. - Delete SMS Messages in your phone. - Upload the backup files to Dropbox/Google Drive and download backup files from Dropbox/Google Drive. - Password protect your backup files. - Support 60000+ messages. Excel 97-2003 spreadsheet has a row limit of 65535. If your phone has more than 65535 messages, the app can export them into multiple files. - View all messages or conversations in an Excel file. Please note that this app does not support MMS (Picture/Audio/Video) messages. This app provides same features as Pro version except advertisements. It requires the Internet permissions to display the Ads. If you do not want ads you can buy the pro version from the Market. For those phones with inbuilt storage the default backup location will probably be the internal storage card, If you want to store the files on external storage card, please change the default export folder in the app’s setting page. If you forgot the password of your file. sorry we have no ability to help you recover it. so please keep your password safe. We'd be very APPRECIATE that if you could help us translate this app to other languages. More detail and up-to-date help guides are available in samapp.net. Keywords: excel text message messages sms backup restore export import sms2excel schedule view print secure Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/samappcares Email: samappserv@gmail.com

description: Najlepsza aplikacja z dowcipami w języku polskim. Aplikacja zawiera 16000 dowcipów w 112 kategoriach! Wszystkie dowcipy znajdują się w aplikacji, więc nie ma konieczności pobierania niczego dodatkowo. Aplikacja zawiera takie opcje jak: - możliwość dodawania dowcipów do ulubionych, - zmiana rozmiaru czcionki oraz jej stylu, - wysyłanie dowcipów za pomocą sms, email, a także publikowanie ich na portalach społecznościowych, - możliwość przewijania dowcipów gestami oraz przez potrząsanie telefonem (po aktywacji opcji) w losowych, - opcję pełnoekranową (po kliknięciu przycisku 'Menu' na urządzeniu), - możliwość usuwania dowcipów jak i całych kategorii, - możliwość przywrócenia bazy danych do pierwotnego stanu, - kopiowanie dowcipu do schowka po długim przytrzymaniu palcem na jego treści. description: In this new fun sports puzzle, your goal is to find the words that match the picture of a sports star. Each picture has three words associated with it. We give you all the letters needed to find the words, and then it's up to you to find the correct solution. Think carefully - it's possible to link more words then the name to each image, but there’s only one correct solution. Throw yourself into the game that every sports fan loves! No registration or complicated rules. Just get started and enjoy all the fun word puzzles! Words in a Pic - sports is a highly addictive game that will keep you entertained for a long time. Can you solve all levels? Good luck!

description: Not another card game, this is really adictive and very fun card game. It is played with Spanish cards and up to 4 players, humans or AI in the same device. It is based on the Spanish card game Tute. It's more adictive than a solitarie and funnier than other card games. Tute is a two players card game. In this game only two player version is available. In this version you have to choose the best card to play between your 6 or 8 cards. Do it your best to win the smart AI based on traditional bar players. Now you can play with a friend via bluetooth

Candy Dragons Jigsaw Puzzle is a fun picture puzzle game. Mamy puzzles has tried and enjoyed it. Now is your turn.. Solve your favourite jigsaw puzzles on the go! App provides an unbeatable puzzle solving experience for puzzle lovers and provides many hours of entertainment for you and your whole family. Transport your child to Candyland, where the Color Dragons need help coloring the Earth - Vivid animations, and immersive functionality will include your child in adventures with four loveable, colorful dragons. - Children will love solving simple puzzles that will put them in the middle of Candyland world. With a colorful cast of characters, the story comes to life at your child’s fingertips: - Randy the Red Color Dragon loves red candy, apples, strawberries, and smiling. - Gracie the Green Dragon loves green candy, growing grass, and shady trees. - Brandon the Blue Dragon loves blue candy, swimming in cool water, and blowing bubbles. - Yop, the Yellow Dragon, and the smallest of the dragons, loves yellow candy, sunshine, daffodils, cozy fires, and toasting marshmallows. - Maddie, the Black Dragon, loves black candy, cloudy days, dark skies, and hates everything colorful. This game is highly recommended to all fans of Jigsaw puzzles!

description: Eureka! An application that lets you personalize your baby album and order it online. By answering the questions about your child’s development and slotting in your best pictures, you will see your baby album take shape on your mobile device. Your baby photos are on your computer? No problem: our app lets you access them directly, no transferring or downloading required. We know your time is valuable, and our app is designed specifically for today’s young parents. The digital version is free; printed albums are available starting at $14.99. Your baby book will be printed and bound by Canada’s leader in photo books, PhotoInPress. Unlike baby albums sold in bookstores, you get: • Your baby’s name and photo on the cover, rather than something generic. • Pages in your image. Only print the pages relating to your own experiences, instead of ending up with blank pages. • Perfectly framed pictures, without having to measure or crop. • No questions left unanswered. Remove the questions you don’t want, rather than leaving empty spaces. • Texts that reflect who you are. Modify the titles and questions as desired, rather than keeping texts that aren’t your style. • Possibility of printing several copies, to give as gifts. The PhotoInPress Baby Album is adapted to the schedule of a new parent. Your album takes shape as the months go by and accompanies you in your daily activities, at home, at the park, or at the pediatrician's. Because baby's world is so vast, this album has been designed to cover all aspects of your baby’s daily life. Dozens of pages are grouped under 7 main headings: • Pregnancy • Birth • Homecoming • Baby's world • Firsts • Celebrations • Retrospective Visit our web site for more details: http://www.photoinpress.ca/baby-album
release_text: You can now move pages and change the page order in your album!

description: İstanbul Ulaşım sayesinde İETT hatlarına, bu hatlardaki otobüslere, otobüslerin lokasyonlarına, durakların lokasyonlarına, duraklardan geçen hatlara ve otobüs saatlerine kolayca ulaşabilirsiniz.  Uygulamanın üzerindeki menü aracılığıyla İETT otobüsleri, durakları, yakınınızda bulunan otobüs durakları, vapur seferleri listelerine erişebilirsiniz. İstanbul Ulaşım, İETT'nin sağlamış olduğu verileri kullanarak çalışmaktadır. Uygulamada kullanılan veriler İETT ve IDO'ya ait olup verilerin doğruluğu konusunda güvence verilememektedir. Görüş ve önerilerinizi, karşılaştığınız hataları ve şikayetlerinizi bildirmek için mail gönderebilirsiniz. Uygulamanın Özellikleri - İETT hatlarını listeleme ve hat listesinde arama yapabilme imkanı - İETT duraklarını listeleme ve durak listesinde arama yapabilme imkanı - Çevrenizdeki İETT duraklarını listeleme - Bir otobüs durağından geçen tüm hatların listesine ulaşabilme - Otobüs hattı üzerindeki tüm otobüslerin yönleriyle birlikte anlık (İETT'nin sağladığı aralıklar ile) olarak haritada gösterilmesi - Otobüs hattının tüm duraklarının haritada gösterilmesi - Otobüs hattı sefer süresi ve hat tipi - İstanbul deniz hatlarını listeleme ve arama yapabilme imkanı - Bütün sefer, hat ve durakları favori listesine ekleme - Tüm seferlere ait saat bilgileri - Türkçe, İngilizce ve Almanca dil desteği Dikkat: Uygulamada kullanılan tüm bilgiler, İETT ve IDO'dan sağlanması sebebiyle kesinliği hakkında garanti verilememektedir.

A beautiful lock screen with Fireflies live wallpaper theme for Android devices, Make you enjoy one of the seven wonders of the insect world on your phone's lock screen,the flashing signals from fireflies looks vivid under forest HD wallpapers. Features: 1. Simulate the flashing signals animation of fireflies. 2. Simulate the animation of fluttering butterfly. 3. Support unlock sound settings,you have ten nice ringtones to choose. 4. Support set pin password via keypad lock screen for lock security. 5. Support customize unlock text,device name and operator name. 6. Support customize wallpaper. 7. Support display notifications such as unread messages ,unread mail,missed call and so on in lock screen. 8. Support 'slide to unlock',including 'slide up to unlock','slide down to unlock','slide left to unlock' and 'slide right to unlock'. 9. Support display widget in lock screen(Recommend music widget) 10. Support Pattern lock for lock security. 11. Support change clock/date text color,text size and text fonts. 12. Support swipe to remove notifications 13. Support change themes for setting background. 14. Blur wallpaper with unread notifications. 15. Support random keypad or password to enhance the security for your phone 16. Support unlock animation. How to use? 1.open this app's settings,then this 'Fireflies live wallpaper lock screen' will start to work. 2.You can preview the screen lock by clicking the 'preview' option no matter when you change any settings. 3.You can change the unlock ways by clicking the 'Slide to unlock style' option and select the corresponding option. FAQ Q: What should I do if I encounter double lock screen? A:You can click 'Disable System Screen Lock' option to close system screen lock or set to none. Q:When I turn on the notifications,it talks back to me while operating my phone. A:Please turn off 'Talkback' in Accessibility of System setting. Q:This lock screen sometimes not work? A:It means that this lock screen had been killed,This happens when the system is in low memory while you are playing games or you start too many applications. In order to avoid this you can toggle on the 'Advanced Settings' to tell the system not to kill it while on low memory. Q:How to uninstall? A:Settings-->Security-->Device administrators,Deactivate the application,then you can uninstall normally. This ‘Fireflies live wallpaper lock screen’ has been tested on latest devices such as Samsung Galaxy S3/S4,Nexus 5/7,HTC one and Sony Xperia Z. Please contact us if your device is not supported. This application is completely free of charge,so download it to enjoy the wonder world of fireflies, In addition, share it with your friends if you really like this application,Thanks!

description: Teach important 5th Grade subjects with 10 fun and interactive games! Advanced subjects such as fractions, pre-algebra, exponents, root words, and reading comprehension are made easy and entertaining. Math, language, and critical thinking skills are all tested and practiced in these games. All 10 games are designed using real Fifth Grade curriculums and are modeled after Common Core State Standards. These lessons are perfect for kids about to enter 5th grade, or for current 5th graders who need a bit of help mastering a specific lesson. This version includes 3 games provided for free, you may unlock all 10 through a simple in-app purchase. Games: * Fractions - Number Lines, Multiply Fractions, Numerator/Denominator * Order of Operations - Solve equations using the correct order * Measure and Volume - Time, metric conversion, and calculating volume * Exponents - Find value, convert to exponents, and scientific notation * Pre-Algebra and Advanced Math - Solve for x using add, subtract, divide, and multiply. * Root Words - Learn the meaning of Greek and Latin root words * Spelling - Hundred of spelling words of varying degrees * Sentence Types - Run-on, incomplete, and a variety of other sentence types * Reading - Read articles and answer questions to improve reading comprehension * Multiple Meanings - Use context to find the correct word Perfect for kids and students who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. This bundle of games helps your child learn important math, language, and problem solving skills while having fun!

description: Support, tip and tricks: http://www.orangepixel.net/forum/ Subscribe to our newsletter for new and exclusive content: http://orangepixel.net/subscribe ------------------- * need help with levels? check facebook.com/meganoidgame and ask us there! ** Free version with advertising (and no level-skip) ** CURRENT VERSION: - 3 game modes (unlockable) - 300 levels (spread cross the 3 game modes) Meganoid gets most of it’s inspiration from 80s and 90s games, the pixel-art graphic style is on purpose! ** THIS GAME IS NOT EASY! Each challenging level can be completed within a minute of gaming, making the pace of the game pretty fast, but many levels require multiply tries to complete. New levels will be added in updates! ** GAME PLAY! - complete a level - level within the time limit = earn a star + achievement - level with all diamonds = earn a star + achievement - 2 stars unlocks Sarge mode! Collect all diamonds in Sarge mode to unlock 3rd star! ** GAME STYLE Meganoid comes in full 8bit retro pixelart style, complete with chiptune and sound effects, we love this style, and it fits the genre! Keep updated on this game by checking: http://www.orangepixel.net/meganoid/ ** BUGS If you have battery-life issues, go to game title screen and press back button, this will exit the game completely. if you run into problems or the game wont work on your device, instead of just rating 1 star, you could help us fix it by providing feedback! Xperia PLAY Optimized MOGA controller supported

description: Space STG 3 - Empire of Extinction is a sequel to the real-time strategy game. It provides Real-time strategy gameplay that recaptures and improves on the magic of the original game. You can find In-universe campaigns and a lot of highly detailed units. It is also designed to focus more heavily on the multiplayer aspect. Immerse yourself in a mortal war of clans. Explore solar systems, manage cities, develop technology and create space fleet and massive armies. Delightfully challenging, yet simple enough to grasp. Megacorporations, more powerful than any single government, compete against each other in a race for the galaxy's vast resources. Their riches bring them more Tech as well as expanding private militaries locked in bloodlust for interstellar supremacy. FEATURES: ★ Achievements and Leaderboard provided by Google Services ★ New development features will enhance the game experience, ★ Groundbreaking single-player campaign with missions and rewards ★ Over the course of 40 campaign missions, ★ Multiplayer mode - play with friends! Available through Google Play Service, ★ Full multiplayer support, with new competitive features and matchmaking utilities, ★ Cloud save via Google Services, ★ ★ ★ BUILDINGS ★ ★ ★ ☆ Main base - Main base provides population limit number. ☆ Metal mine - Metal mining provides metal minerals. ☆ Crystal mine - Crystal mining provide crystal minerals. ☆ Graphen mine - Graphen mine provide mining and production of graphen minerals. ☆ Power plant - Power plant produces energy in planet. Low energy on planet causes slower building. ☆ Ship yard - Provide the ability to buy spacecraft. Every level provide increase building speed of units. ☆ Defence building - Defence building provide the ability to buy planetary defences. Every level provide increase building speed of units. ☆ Laboratory - Research and develop technology. Provides the ability to buy technology. Every level provide increase building speed of units. ★ ★ ★ SHIPS ★ ★ ★ ☆ Transporter - It transports minerals from planet to planet. ☆ Colonizer - It colonizes an empty planet which allows you to build buildings on that planet. ☆ Fighter - Light and very fast fighter. It can perform quick attack. ☆ Warrior - Medium class spaceship. Transformation ability increase guns power. ☆ Bomber - Bomber has the ability to destroy buildings and defence from distance. ☆ Warship - Powerful spacecraft with ability to shoot from large distance. ☆ Protector - Protector has ability to hide through battle. ☆ Mother ship - Most powerful unit with ability to change destination through space flight. Big blast weapons allows to destroy several ships pararell. ★ ★ ★ DEFENCE ★ ★ ★ ☆ Soldier - Soldier is weak short distance defence unit. ☆ Xr-10 - Xkr-10 is weak long distance defence option. ☆ Mech warrior - Mech warrior average short distance defence unit. ☆ Xr-x10 adv - Xkr-x10 advanced is heavy mech with decent long rangee attack level. ☆ Vector - Vector is big strong defence unit. ☆ Plasma cannon - Big cannon can destroy several ships palarell. ★ ★ ★ TECHNOLOGY ★ ★ ★ ☆ Defence station - Defence station defends space. It has long distance weapon to maintain order in space. Send it into space. ☆ Mining station - Mining station allows you to mine minerals from asteroids. Send it to an asteroid and choose mineral to mine. ☆ Merchant station - Merchant station provide ability to trade minerals. Send minerals by transporters to station to start exchange minerals. ☆ Defensive shield - Defensive shield enables layer all over the planet. It can defend from nuclear missile, bomber attack and enemy ships invasion. ☆ Invisibility - Makes player's ships invisible. Activate prior to sending. ☆ Missile - It can destroy enemy buildings and defence units on a planet. ☆ Electrical storm - It is a offense/defence option. Use it when enemy ships are near to deal damage. ☆ Probe - Probes provide information about an enemy's buildings, ships, defence and technology.

description: Ad free version. Climbing Frog (aka Frog Leaps) is platformer game and physics puzzle in one pack! Game inspired by a plastic frog toy - You press it, release, and it jumps. In this game it just quite simple, press on frog, drag it down, arrow then show direction and strength of jump, release finger and frog will jump! Slide Your finger on screen space to panning. In first version of game You will find some strong platforms, some quite broken, somewhere grows dangerous cactus. Next level pack will include moving platforms and dangerous wasp. description: Continue your adventure throughout the worlds of Yggdrasil in this stylized tower defense interpretation of the classical Norse myths with Thor and his Army! Journey with the god of thunder, the goddess of beauty and sorcery and an intrepid valkyrie to avenge the destruction of Asgard. Put a stop to the evildoers who wish to bring the chaos of Ragnarok to the nine realms! “The sun will go black, earth sink in the sea, heaven be stripped of its bright stars” — Gylfaginning (“The Tricking of Gylfi”), Prose Edda The mighty Norse heroes are back in this free, action-packed sequel! After defeating the Trickster Loki (in “Thor: Lord of Storms”), Thor, Freya and Brunhilde have learned new powers and abilities - and they’re going to need them to push back Ragnarok! The heroes must fight their way through the smoking ruins of Asgard, cross the rainbow bridge, Bifrost, and descend into Niflheim, the mysterious primordial land of ice and mist. They will face difficult odds and will confront countless enemies including dragons, the Midgard Serpent, and even a fallen Norn. Features: - Simple controls, deep and challenging gameplay - Journey across new realms in pursuit of new foes - Choose your favorite champion from Norse mythology: Thor the Thunderer, Freya the Enchantress, or Brunhilde the Valkyrie shieldmaiden. - New powers and abilities - Upgrade your hero to improve your stats and unlock new skills that will help you dominate the battlefield. - Summon Odin, Eir, Tyr, and other mythical characters to aid you in battle - Build up and upgrade your armies to defeat the harbingers of Ragnarok Download Thor: Champions of Asgard now and help Thor, Freya, and Brynhilde deliver justice to the evil villains who wish to spread chaos and destruction across the Nine Worlds. ‘Tis hammer time! ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

★★★★★ (5/5) "WordWow is an explosion of thought-provoking, perplexing, and thrilling fun for almost all ages." - AppAdvice WordWow is a word game where you make words to dig deeper into the ground. As you dig down, Worm will follow until you can guide him to the bottom before time runs out. You need to be able to make words quickly to string together bonuses, as well as just to clear the path. WordWow will sharpen your brain as well as your reflexes. If you find Worm to be stuck and you can't come up with any words, you can use a bomb to clear some of the tiles. You have a limited number of bombs, but you can earn more as you make more words. As Worm moves down the board, more letters become available. Some levels have a hidden gem behind one of the tiles, and if you can find all the gems in all the levels of a world, a bonus level is opened where you can really rack up the points! The bigger the words that you can make the more points you'll earn. Try and make enough points each level to earn all three stars. Help a worm out! Features: * 140,000 word dictionary (from the official Scrabble dictionary) * Fast and addictive action * Over 100 Levels and 5 colorful worlds!

In Case of an Emergency - emergency services & hospital staff will only have access to ICE Emergency app. * Emergency Services – automatic number update for Ambulance, Fire & Police when you travel abroad; 230+ countries * SOS – sends SOS message to your Emergency Contacts, automatically includes GPS location * Advanced Silent Mode – never miss an urgent Call or Message while phone is on Silent Mode * Healthcare Providers – location based listing for Hospitals, Doctors, Dentists and Pharmacies (using Google maps). Yet another note-taking App... with a twist. Evernote and other popular Apps are fine for when you want to document something, and keep a note about it. But what about the times when you just need to scribble down some random bit of info? A phone number, an email address, a reminder to yourself - then a full-blown notebook App is overkill. Notification Memo lets you create this kind of throw-away notes easily: - Tap on the App icon to create a new memo. It will instantly be added to the notification area for easy reference. - Select the color of your memo (yellow, red, green) with just a few taps. - Swipe the memo from the notification area when you do not need it anymore and it's gone, just like any other notification. - If your memo is extra important then you can pin it. Pinned notes can't be swiped away, but must first be opened and then deleted. The App works great from a shortcut on the home screen, or added directly to the notification are using Notification Shortcuts.

description: Stressed about your college classes? Not fully getting the concepts? Need more practice problems? Or just really need to make sure you get that “A”? We can help! Study Edge is simply the best way for college students to increase their understanding of course material and improve their grades. Our app delivers streaming video and study content on-demand for historically difficult courses such as chemistry, economics, mathematics, and physics, just to name a few. We offer several types of study videos, all of which are specific to your class’s textbook and professor: Exam Reviews Chapter Reviews Practice Problem Solutions In addition to our videos, we also offer custom study guides and practice problem sets to help fully prepare you for that upcoming exam. Our content is created by our team of Study Experts composed of professional tutors and graduate students, all of whom have years of experience tutoring in their respective subjects and can teach difficult concepts in ways that college students can easily grasp. Each subject also has its own interactive Class Wall, enabling students to connect with our Study Experts and other students at any time of day. Students ask their own questions and can also receive Karma Points for answering fellow students' questions. Our content and class wall are fully available online and on-demand 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, providing affordable study expertise and support to both students and parents. Study Edge provides more than just tutoring, we give students the EDGE they need to succeed. Try us out for FREE today! App Features: Textbook- and professor-specific video content 24/7, interactive wall to get live help for your questions Practice problem sets Custom study guides We want to hear from you! To submit feedback, questions, or comments please email us at help@studyedge.com or find us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/studyedge .

description: Play "4 in a Row" against the computer or friends from all over the world! "4 in a Row" is one of the most popular strategy games in the world, this app gives you three different game modes. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Details ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ "4 in a Row" is a game classic for two players. Goal of the game is to line up four discs of your color to a horizontal, vertical or diagonal line. Alternating, you and your opponent drop discs into the grid and try to complete a line of four discs against the computer, friends or strangers from all over the world! We've packed the beloved strategy and tactics game in a free app, which features three game modes: - Singleplayer: Play alone on one device against the computer Here you can learn "4 in a Row" or train your strategy and tactics. Three difficulties help you in doing so. - Local Multiplayer: Singleplayer rules apply. The game is played on one mobile device. Try to beat a friend with logic by tapping on the columns and connecting four of your discs in one line. - Online Multiplayer: Play the classic against "4 in a Row" players all over the world. Play on more than one device, given your opponent also has the free app. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ More details ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ The online multiplayer mode has some great features for you: - Every online victory earns you points. - If you win an online game of "4 in a Row" against an opponent, who has accumulated a lot of points, you'll get an accordingly higher score. - The higher you score in games of "4 in a Row", the higher you climb on the leaderboards. - You can start chats to talk with people all over the world, analyze your moves or just chitchat. - An online friend list makes it possible to invite your friends to a round of "4 in a Row" without charge. - Our free "4 in a Row" app is available worldwide. You can play against opponents all over the world online to show your logics and tactics skills, by connecting your 21 discs to a line of four before your opponent. - You can always see which country your opponent is from. - We hope you like our free "4 in a Row"! And we're always happy about feedback (also critical) on our free online strategy game. Just send an email to our support address. Have fun playing "4 in a Row"!

description: The Find™ App by realtor.com® is an agent tool designed exclusively for real estate professionals in specific participating MLSs only. In order to use this app, confirmation that you are an active member in your MLS, as well as a realtor.com® Control Panel login, will be required. For Associations and Multiple Listing Services interested in providing the Find™ App by realtor.com® to their membership, please contact your realtor.com® Industry Relations Representative. Combining the best of everything you love in the realtor.com® Real Estate App with the professional tools you trust in Find, the Find™ App is the perfect partner for a busy professional on the go. MLS members will have access to classic features like searching by school and school district, drawing your own custom search, and making personal notes on listings you love. The Find™ App also delivers specific enhancements exclusively for agents, including: - Cross-sharing of private listing data between partner MLSes, delivering important partner MLS data in an elegant mobile format. - Support for leading showing scheduling services, enabling easy-to-use schedule showing from within the app. - Member Directory • Search for members by first or last name, email address, broker or office name • Just start typing to instantly get the info. Recently viewed member contact cards are automatically remembered for quick future retrieval. • Tap and hold contact info to perform other actions, like sending a text or adding to your address book. • Find App is the first product to integrate the new realtor.com agent profiles. In the new Member Directory feature, click View Profile button on member contact cards to see agent photos, biographies, specialties, geographic areas served, current listings and recent sales, integrations with social media, recommendations and more. - Get all the details on the listing you are standing in front of with just 1 tap! The Find Me curbside search feature saves you time by detecting your location and immediately opening the details for the listing in front of you. - The Autocomplete feature automatically appears in all text search fields, and serves up addresses for all For Sale properties contained in realtor.com, increasing agent productivity. - Community info on listings - Users of Find™ App can view the very popular Community report previously available only in the Find website product. Private listing information to help you do your job, including: • Agent remarks • Agreement type • Compensation details • Agent showing instructions • Number of days the listing has been on realtor.com • Short sale and bank owned status • Single-click access to contacting listing or selling agent or broker directly • Driving directions • Other MLS -specific private data Find™ App is not a consumer-facing app, though it leverages the best of the consumer app. If you are not an agent, please download the realtor.com® Real Estate App if you are a home buyer or seller.
release_text: Find App v1.6 delivers a number of bug fixes, plus the removal of the consumer collaboration features.

description: Acquire real-time information from clubs around the world, as well as the latest trends (1) “KUVO FEED” to acquire accurate information on tracks currently playing at clubs This function allows clubbers to check up on tracks being played at clubs around the world, or details of DJs playing in real-time. They can then listen to demo versions of tracks, and jump to Online Music Store to purchase a track. In addition to messages from DJs or clubs that are playing tunes or browsing the profiles of DJs, clubbers can follow their favorite clubs or DJs, register their favorite musical tastes and display the latest information on their own account screen. (2) “Discover” to uncover the latest trends in tracks or DJs around the world This function provides updates on the latest trends in clubs, DJs or tracks from around the world, with “Trending” based on the number of clubbers pressing “Like” for tracks or playlists played at clubs, or “Most Liked” based on “Like” or “Follower” numbers. (3) “Playlist” that shows information on tracks played by favorite DJs This function allows clubbers to check or search for tracks that their favorite DJs have played, or tracks that were played at events held in the past. Comments can also be added to playlists or sent directly to the DJs, giving clubbers an experience like they were there at the actual event. (4) “Club Map” to show potential clubs nearby The “Club Map” function displays tracks being played in each region, or DJ details in real-time on a map, which allows clubbers to easily find a club that suits their current mood or that is playing tracks that they want to hear. Tracks can be played from the club information playlist, and clubbers can check up on event information released by the club. (5) “Photo Album” to share pictures with information taken at clubs The “KUVO App” comes with the “Photo Album” function that stamps pictures taken at clubs with the current name of the track being played, the DJ name and the club name. Data from when a picture was taken can be saved easily, making it simple to clearly recall memorable moments from a club. Pictures that have been taken can be sent as is by email, and include a “share” button to upload pictures to social media.

description: Программа Postchecker предназначена для отслеживания международных и локальных почтовых отправлений. Postchecker является приложением одноименного сервиса http://postchecker.ru . На сайте http://postchecker.ru можно подписаться на уведомления обновлений трек-кодов по Email или SMS. Для входа используйте те же регистрационные данные, что и в программе. В ближайших обновлениях эта возможность будет доступна и в самой программе. Вы можете добавлять неограниченное количество трек-кодов почтовых отправлений. Никакой абонентской платы за пользование программой или сервисом. Никаких капч. Наш сервис проверяет трек-коды каждые три часа напрямую на сайтах почтовых компаний, поэтому Вы всегда будете в курсе движения своих отправлений. Синхронизация информации между всеми Вашими устройствами, а так же вся информация и дополнительные возможности по работе с трек-кодами на сайте http://postchecker.ru На данный момент поддерживается отслеживание посылок, отправленных через почтовые службы следующих стран: России, Сингапура, Гонконга, Китая, США, Швеции, Казахстана, Чехии, Японии, Германии, Беларуси, Швейцарии, Израиля, Словакии, Малайзии, Южной Кореи, Индии, Великобритании, Узбекистана. Список стран постоянно обновляется, при этом обновление приложения не требуется. Если у Вас возникли какие-либо проблемы с отслеживанием или Вы хотите отслеживать посылку из стран, не пооддерживаемых нашим сервисом, отправьте мне номер трек-кода на почту help@postchecker.ru либо на сайте поддержки http://postchecker.ru/support Postchecker program designed to monitor international and local mail. Postchecker is an application of the same name service http://postchecker.ru . The site http://postchecker.ru can subscribe to notifications of updates Track codes for Email or SMS. To enter, use the same login details as the program. In the next updates of this feature will be available in the program itself. You can add an unlimited number of track postal codes. No monthly fees for the use of the program or service. No captchas. Our service checks track codes every three hours directly to sites postal companies, so you will always be aware of their movements items. Synchronize information between all your devices, as well as all information and additional opportunities to work with the track codes online http://postchecker.ru Currently supports tracking packages sent through the postal service the following countries: Russia, Singapore, Hong Kong, China, the USA, Sweden, Kazakhstan, Czech Republic, Japan, Germany, Belarus, Switzerland, Israel, Slovakia, Malaysia, South Korea, India, UK , Uzbekistan. The list of countries is constantly updated with the update application requires. If you have any problems with tracking or you want to track the parcel from countries poodderzhivaemyh our service, please send me the number of the track to the post code or help@postchecker.ru support site http://postchecker.ru/support

Labyrinth is a addictive brain challenge game. Move the ball through the maze and collect the targets in the labyrinth with as few swipes as possible. Watson Real Estate Mobile is an easy to use GPS-enabled real estate app that can help you find a house to buy in North Eastern Florida and the surrounding areas. You can search for a new homes and real estate anytime, anywhere using the Watson real estate app. Your home search can be viewed on an interactive map and organized by price, neighborhood, or even closest to the exact point you are standing. Once you find a house in your category, take a virtual tour of any and all properties that appeal to you. Find out everything about a home that strikes your fancy from the year it was built to the yearly tax rates, and much more. The Watson Real Estate Mobile App is a powerful property search real estate tool. Brought to you by Watson Real Estate. Watson Real Estate Mobile serves the home buyers or home sellers in the North Eastern Florida real estate market. Use this GPS enabled mobile real estate app to learn about the tight-knit world of North Eastern FL real estate. When you are ready to buy a house, Watson Real Estate Mobile property search can link you to one of the more than 200 real estate agents who are ready to help you with your home search in Jacksonville, Daytona Beach, Kissimmee, Orlando, and New Smyrna Beach, FL regions.. Save your favorite home research to view later. You can also text or email homes to your family and friends. If you have questions or want a tour of the home for sale, press the “Contact” feature to contact a Watson Real Estate representative who can assist you.

Never miss a DX spot again. Get live DX spots on your Android device. DX Cluster's focus is on alarms and real time spots. The app runs in the background as a service and alarms you with a ringtone of your choice when a callsign or prefix appears in the DX Cluster. The key features of DX Cluster are: - Real time spots: Connect to one of the 60 AR-Clusters in the database and get real time spots. - Filtering: A country filter can be set to filter out countries of the spotter or spot. If you just want to receive spots originated from North America enter K,VE and choose spotter. If you just want to see spots from Germany, Netherland and England, choose DX and enter DL,PA,G. - Alarms: DX Cluster will alarm you by a ringtone of your choice if a callsign or a prefix appears in the DX Cluster. For example enter ZL8 in the alarm field and as soon as a spot with the prefix ZL8 appears on the cluster the DX Cluster will alarm you. Multiple callsign or prefix entries are possible. This app is intended to use by ham radio (amateur radio) operators only. You need a ham radio callsign to log into the DX cluster! For any question please visit our new forum at http://www.wolphi.com/forum/

# Chords / Scales / Tuner / Metronome / Game for Guitar You can look up guitar chords and scales with a full-screened illustration of a guitar fret. Also you can play a sound of a chord or a scale. It shows a note name of a chord / scale and also it shows a fingering of a chord. Octaves can be distinguished by its color. To help tuning your guitar, a simple tuner is included. A simple game named 'Fret Master' is designed to help guitarists to memorize note names on a fretboard. Total 2235 chords with 39 types of chord and 12 types of scale are available. When a fret is touched, it plays a guitar sound. Navigate the fret by scrolling the background. For variations, simply rub the bottom bar. Also, there's an option for a left-handed guitarlist. :: Full Screen Guitar Fret It shows a guitar fret over the entire screen except the header where you can select a key and a chord / scale. With the large image, chords can be seen from a distance. Hold your guitar with your two hands, put your Android on a desk. :: 2235 Chords 39 types of chords are available. Each chord type has more than one chord, so it has 2235 chords total. :: 144 Scales 12 types of scale are supported, and it results 144 scales with a combination of a root note. :: Tuner Trust your ears! It can sounds an open string repeatedly. Try tuning your guitar while listening the repeated sound. :: Metronome Metronome let user know the accurate tempo using sounds and a screen color. It supports an on beat and an off beat within 30 ~ 220 bpm. :: Fret Master Be a master of the Fret! Fret Master is a simple game that is designed to help guitarists to memorize note names on the fretboard. Tell the note name of the given note on the fret, or conversly find a note on the fret that matches to the given note name. :: Chord Tones Note name can be displayed. Higher octave notes are distinguished by color. Root note is marked with a star. :: Fingering Fingering number can be displayed on a chord tone. :: Left-Handed Guitar An option for a left-handed guitar player is ready. :: Sharp(＃) or Flat(♭) Notation Which notation do you prefer? You can set what you hope to. If the system font doesn't support ＃ and ♭ characters, then # and b can be used instead. :: Clearly Recorded Guitar Sound Each of 6 strings responses and sounds independently to a screen touch. Of course you can strumming it. Every guitar sound is recorded clearly with a professional audio device. :: Keep Screen On Screen shouldn't turned off even if you didn't touch the screen repeatedly, because two of your hands have to handle your guitar. :: Screen Orientation The screen orientation can be locked to a portrait, a landscape or an auto. :: Hardware buttons Hardware keys such as a menu button or a back button can be disabled. :: Followings are supported chords. Major Major 6th Major 7th Major 9th Major Add 9th Major 6th / 9th Minor Minor 6th Minor 7th Minor 9th Minor 11th Minor Major 7th Minor Add 9th Minor 6th / 9th Dominant 7th Dominant 9th Dominant 11th Dominant 13th Dominant 7th Flat 5th Dominant 7th Augmented 5th Dominant 7th Flat 9th Dominant 7th Augmented 9th Dominant 7th Flat 9th Augmented 5th Dominant 7th / 6th Dominant 9th Flat 5th Dominant 9th Augmented 5th Dominant Augmented 11th Dominant 13th Flat 9th Dominant 13th Flat 9th Flat 5th Diminished Diminished 7th Minor 7th Flat 5th (= Half Diminished) Augmented Suspended 2nd Suspended 4th Dominant 7th Suspended 2nd Dominant 7th Suspended 4th 5th (= Power Chord) Flat 5th :: Followings are supported scales. Major (= Ionian) Dorian Phrygian Lydian Mixolydian Aeolian (= Natural Minor) Locrian Melodic Minor (Ascending) Harmonic Minor Major Pentatonic Minor Pentatonic Blues

Ever wanted to know how many seconds you’ve lived so far? Or like how many hours you’ve slept, or exactly how many days you’ve got left till your next birthday? Well you can now easily find that stuff out. All you need to do is enter your birthday date. Some of the calculations include: - Week day of birth - What famous person shares a birthday with you and who is celebrating today - Your zodiac sign, as well as your chinese year. - Length that you walked in your lifetime - Amount of breaths taken - Amount of heartbeats made - And a whole lot more If anything of the above has you interested, then this application is for you. Get to know fun stuff about your birthday and birthdays of others. App features an easy way to change units from metric to imperial and remembers the last 5 birthdates that you entered. More statistics coming soon!

A simple browser with speed being our moto. We've tried to build a internet browser with only important features and removing unwanted features so the browsing experience become faster then the fastest. This browser is simple to use and fast. So switch to 3G-4G Web browser if you need the speed. You can block ads from setting area. App features: - Simple UI with easy and fast to use browser. - Easy access to all important features right in the browsing page. - Ad block Features available in settings. - Easy access to history and bookmarks, and clearing history, cooking and cache in advance settings. - Other features like full-screen, block ads, location access, Incognito mode, search suggestions and much more. - Completely free to use. As this browser is free to use, we have placed nominal ads. Tired from slow browser? Stop using old outdated browsers. Instead update to this modern and super fast browsing experience. Its more fast and better. No matter with your slow internet speed, browsing with 3g/4g Browser will speed up your browsing. You can create short cut on home page for instant excess of your particular website. Tags : Super Fast Browsing

Keep track of your expenses and stay productive on the go. Large and small businesses can easily track business travel and manage expense reports anytime - from anywhere - with Concur. *This app is a companion to Concur’s solutions for existing users* Extend the benefits of Concur's business travel and expense reporting solution to your phone while you're on the go! Simply download now and create your mobile PIN to enjoy all the functionality associated with the Concur solution you already use. With Concur's mobile app, say goodbye to shuffling paper receipts. No more struggling to remember how much you paid in cab fare. Now, all of your receipts and expense charges are gathered and ready for an expense report when you get home. Manage and track business expenses and receipts *Import data from credit cards *Photograph receipts and edit expenses in Airplane mode or when connected *Capture a receipt or create a Quick Expense in "airplane" mode *Keep track of receipts using our Receipt Store *Approve expense reports *Submit expense reports *Itemize hotel charges *Add event and meeting attendees *Approve Travel Request Manage and track business travel *Book airfare, hotels and more *A brand new hotel booking experience *See customized hotel suggestions *Manage your itinerary *Integrate with TripIt and TripIt Pro Take a Test Drive *Demo key features Concur has to offer *Use preloaded sample receipts and reports *NOTE: Do not use Test Drive for actual expense capture and reporting Concur Permissions: *Your social information (Read your contacts): required to access your contacts so Expense users creating Expenses with Attendees can add/search people from their device address book. *Your accounts (Find accounts on the device): required in order to receive push notifications. Learn more at www.concur.com. Must be an existing Concur Small Business edition, Concur Standard edition, Concur Professional edition, or Concur Premium edition user and create a mobile PIN to access the application.

description: 3 great games in 1!!! The magic Digger Picture Game for kids lets your child scratch away the color to reveal a secret picture hidden underneath. There are diggers, fork lift trucks, dump trucks, lorries, and many, many more pictures to discover. Also included is the magic water coloring game which lets you add colors to existing black and white images to complete the picture, and now you can even paint your own pictures. The magic Digger Picture Game includes - - Scratch card game - Watercolor game - Painting game The free edition of the Digger Picture Game is a complete and unrestricted, ad-supported version of the app. To play ad free, please download the premium edition of the Digger Picture Game from the Google play marketplace. This children's game is suitable for all ages.
