description: Vegetables are very good for the health, so parents often encourage their children eat more fruit. Identify-vegetables game helps kids both identify all basic kinds of fruits and foster their favorites of eating fruits. In this game, children have chances to learn more types of vegetables and fruits. Funny sound and adorable images in Identify-vegetables game will certainly bring pleasure to children.

Football Transfer Centre lists every transfer since 1992 for 50 clubs in the English Premier League and Football League. This powerful analysis tool details transfer records, league tables, club transfer histories and all the latest football news. A must for all football fanatics out there! Features: - 20 seasons of in-depth transfer statistics for 50 teams. - Compare money spent with league position and points won. - Club by club transfer spend rankings. - Managers transfer spend rankings. - Recording sales and signings per club. - Live football transfer news feed via BBC Sport - Share transfer stats via social networks Featured football teams: Premiership - Arsenal - Aston Villa - Chelsea - Everton - Fulham - Liverpool - Man City - Man United - Newcastle - Norwich - QPR - Reading - Southampton - Stoke - Sunderland - Swansea - Tottenham Hotspur - West Brom - West Ham - Wigan Football League - Barnsley - Birmingham - Blackburn - Blackpool - Bolton - Bradford - Brighton - Bristol City - Burnley - Cardiff - Charlton - Crystal Palace - Derby - Huddersfield - Hull City - Ipswich - Leeds - Leicester - Middlesbrough - Millwall - MK Dons - Nottingham Forest - Oldham - Peterborough - Portsmouth - Sheffield United - Sheffield Wed - Swindon - Watford - Wolves The figures are as accurate as possible. If you find a missing or incorrectly recorder transfer please contact us via Twitter: @OptaTransfers Disclaimer: This is not an official Opta app.
release_text: Version 2.2 - Bug fixes - Improved user interface and navigation. - Interactive league tables. - 2012 summer transfer window update. - Compare money spent with league position and points won. - Added 30 new clubs to transfer history records. - Organised clubs in Premier League and Football League. - You can now share transfer stats via social networks.

description: SRF Verkehrsinfo hält Sie über die aktuelle Verkehrslage auf den Schweizer Strassen auf dem Laufenden. Anhand von Webcam-Bildern können Sie das Verkehrsaufkommen selber beobachten. Ausserdem erfahren Sie, in welchen Parkhäusern in grösseren Städten noch Plätze frei sind. Hauptfunktionen von „SRF Verkehsinfo“: • Informationen zur aktuellen Verkehrslage auf den Schweizer Strassen mit folgenden Kategorien: Verkehrslage, Strassenzustand, Baustellen, Pässe, Tunnelzufahrten, Autoverlad, Parking und Webcams • Kartenansicht mit Infos zum Verkehrsfluss • Locate-me-Funktion: positioniert die Karte an Ihrem Standort. • Listenfunktion mit Meldungen in der Nähe und Favoriten • Push-Nachrichten-Dienst für wichtige Autobahnabschnitte • Staumelder und Notfallnummern • Informationen zum Bahnverkehr • Sprachversionen deutsch, französisch (RTS trafic) und italienisch (RSI.ch traffico) SRF Traffic keeps you informed of the current traffic situation on the Swiss roads to date. Using webcam images You can watch the traffic itself. You will also learn where car parks in major cities there are places available. Key features of "SRF Verkehsinfo": • information about the current traffic situation on the Swiss roads following categories: traffic, road conditions, construction sites, passports, tunnel entrances, car transport, parking and Webcams • Map with information about the traffic flow • locate me function: positions the map to your location. • List function with messages near and Favorites • Push-message service for major highway sections • congestion indicators and emergency numbers • information on rail services • languages ​​German, French (RTS trafic) and Italian (RSI.ch traffico)

50% off sale! Grab this cult classic now before the price goes back to normal. Amazing and rewarding game play will keep your preschooler entertained for hours! Cute graphics, awesome sound effects and the professional voice recording of the word spoken by a licensed speech therapist makes this award winning app a favorite among thousands of preschoolers. 144 super duper puzzles!
release_text: Optimized Code is now stable across all devices, old and new, big and small!

description: EDictPro (English Dictionary Pro) is the best free and offline english dictionary with all english data in one. With English Dictionary EDictPro, this app has rich sets of data and supports some new special features. In the new version of English Dictionary Pro (EDictPro), only EDictPro, supports the new special features: * Support widget to learn english word in main dictionary, your favourite or your word notes. * Support 'Quick Dictionary' to lookup quickly the meaning of keywords. * Add 'Chemical Dictionary' data. * Support Pro Version (No ads) by purchasing the licence of app. * Allows select main dictionary quickly in main screen. * Allows show/hide the meaning for earch dictionary: This feature will help you focus on your dictionaries interested. * Save and display note of the keywords: This feature will help you save more information about the word, save your general meaning. It helps you focus and remember the characteristic meaning of the words. The app English Dictionary EDictPro support the rich data sets: - Wordnet dictionary - Babylon English Dictionary - Babylon Picture Dictionary - American Idioms - World History Dictionary - Microsoft Computer Dictionary - Gerry Vocab Teacher - Britannica Concise Dictionary - Chemical Compound Dictionary - Chemical Dictionary (New) - Word Web 1.1 (New) - Wiktionary (New) - Oxford World Encyclopedia (New) - Shorter Oxford English Dictionary 1.3.3 (New) - English Grammar Secrets (New) - Infographics English Grammar (New) English Dictionary Pro (EDictPro) is very useful for those who are learning English. With English Dictionary EDictPro, you can lookup the keywords, learn, find and remember words very very easily. English Dictionary EDictPro has features as following: - The application is very light, the whole data dictionary is stored on the external card. - No need internet connectivity to use the app. You only need a network connection for the first time to download data. - User-friendly and beautiful interface. Look-up in the dictionaries is very easy, simple. - Lookup cross between the dictionaries. And allows show/hide the meaning for each dictionary. - Support for looking up keyword by voice. - Support for keyword link, pronunciation. - Support for showing image in data - Support landscape screen. - Support selecting text on meaning area to lookup, translate and read. - Support translation function between 70 languages. - Support for saving and management of favorite words to make the users easy in learning new words. This application can be used as Dictionary, English Dictionary, English English Dictionary, Wordnet Dictionary, Babylon English Dictionary, Babylon Picture Dictionary, American Idioms, World History Dictionary, Microsoft Computer Terms, Gerry Vocab Teacher, Britannica Concise Dictionary, Chemical Compound Dictionary
release_text: Version 2.1.3: - Fix translation function. Version 2.0: - Support new data: Word Web 1.1, Wiktionary, Oxford World Encyclopedia, Shorter Oxford English Dictionary 1.3.3, Infographics English Grammar, English Grammar Secrets - Fix some minor bugs

description: LinkStation Player is a simple music player that streams mp3s over the Internet (via Wifi or 3G/4G) from your Buffalo storage device, such as the LinkStation Live! series of Network Attached Storage (NAS) servers. Includes a built-in image viewer and basic music controls (seek/play/stop/etc) and playlist builder. Queue Download feature lets you download your playlist for offline listening (paid version only). New! "Hop Time" feature automatically builds a collection of images from your LinkStation comprised of shots taken on the same day 1 year ago, 2 years ago, etc. Perfect for those of us who enjoy the TimeHop(tm) app but have since moved images off our phones and onto the LS. Fun for all ages!

description: Download the Opera for Android beta today and try the latest features being developed specifically for our most powerful browser. Become part of our development process and give Opera vital feedback to help us create the best browser for high-end mobile devices. Participating in the beta is free and open to anyone. It allows you early access to our fastest browser, designed for the most popular Android smartphones. As with any beta, there may be some bugs and frequent updates, but we encourage you to report any issues you encounter while trying this version of Opera for Android. Visit our forum to participate in discussions with developers and other beta users: http://forums.opera.com/categories/en-opera-for-android/ If you have a quick question, you may find help in our answers to frequently asked questions at http://www.opera.com/help/mobile/android/ . If you’re looking for the stable, public version of the Opera browser for Android, you can find that at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.opera.browser. For all the latest news on Opera, and to engage us in a more laid-back way, follow us on Twitter or like our Facebook page. Twitter – http://twitter.com/opera/ Facebook – http://www.facebook.com/opera/

With this app you can view 3D-Images in the Side-by-Side Format (One image splitted for the right and left eye) like they are on a big screen. This app uses the headtracking to prevent "Motion Sickness" which can occurr if you move your head and the image didnt move in this direction. You have to create a folder named "VRImageViewer" on your sd-card in which you put the images. If you have a device without a sd-card slot like the "Nexus 4" you have to create the folder into the normal storage. You need images in this format: http://www.google.de/search?q=stereoscopic+parallel&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X With a controller like the iDroid you can control the images with the left analog stick. Controls: Left stick up and down = zoom in and out Left stick left and right = previous and next image Tested on a Google Nexus 4 with iDroid Controller and the OpenDive. Supports all Android compatible HMDs with Gyroscope like: Durovis Dive: www.durovis.com Refugio3D: www.refugio3d.net Coogle Cardboard: http://g.co/cardboard Samsung Gear VR: http://techcrunch.com/2014/09/03/samsung-gear-vr-oculus-ceo-brendan-iribe/ VReye GO: http://vrelia.com/vreyego/

HELP JACK AND HIS FRIENDS GET HOME! Join Jack Truck and his friends in this wacky puzzle game based off the Trucktown cartoon! Kids tap to line up the roads so the trucks can safely make it home before time runs out. Be careful - the roads are slippery and tricky! Can YOU make it back to the junkyard? This tricky truck game includes: •Play as Jack and all his friends: Max, Lucy, Big Rig, and more! •Help the trucks make it home before time runs out! •Watch out for oil slicks, wet spots, and crazy garbage! •Play in the dirt or on the road •Put together larger roads for bonus points! Trucktown is a brand new show from Nelvana Digital!

RUN Jungle Speed Run 3D! Help the Prisoner escape from the police and see how far you can make it run! Swipe to turn, jump over obstacles and collect jewels pieces to buy power ups and unlock new cool staffs. ★ A really cool prison guy for you to save ★ Great 3D graphics environment ★ Real-life African Jungle experience ★ Thrill of a close Prison break chase ★ Lightning fast swipe controls ★ Challenge your friends and beat their scores If you like Temple Run, Subway Surfers and Agent Dash, then Jungle Speed Run 3D is definitely the next game to be on your Android. But there is a slight difference – You will be testing your skills to save one of the most endangered Prisoners in the world! An escaped prisoner has accidentally landed itself in an African Jungle. Yes, it is far far away from home. But that’s the least of its worries. A bunch of bad ass cops have taken to its scent and are chasing it down in a police car, trying to capture it. Now, it is on your shoulders to help the him run away from the evil guys. The path is a not a smooth one either! There are lots of obstacles - low branches, barbed wires, rocks and the works. Maneuver the Bengal Tiger through all the hurdles and help it jump over them and have a flawless run. Don’t forget to collect the special items. The more you collect the better it is because these help you unlock new, more cool staff. Download the addictive Jungle Speed Run 3D game now and Save The prisoner! Here’s what everyone’s saying about Jungle Speed Run 3D - ★ "Most thrilling and fun Parkour running game in a while," ★ "A fast and frenzied experience." ★ "Very addictive… definitely a very different running game." ★ “Best fun and smooth game for all mobile devices” ★ “Simple and Addictive Game Play” ★ “If you like Temple, Dash, Subway games, then this is the game for you”

DIVE IN AND JOIN NEMO ON HIS LATEST ADVENTURE. BUILD A BEAUTIFUL REEF, AND MAKE A HOME FOR YOUR FAVORITE FINDING NEMO CHARACTERS! Nemo and his dad, Marlin, set out to build the coolest reef in his class. Help Nemo create a best-in-class underwater retreat, and discover the secrets to building a permanent home for his friends! ★ Continue Nemo's story and adventures beneath the sea! ★ Create and personalize your very own underwater paradise. ★ Make a home for your favorite characters from Finding Nemo including Dory, Gill, Bloat, Bubbles, and more! ★ Find the different combinations of plants and decorations to delight Nemo's friends and other exotic fish. ★ Discover and plant rare seeds to attract extremely rare and mysterious fish. ★ Collect over 50 kinds of fish to enhance your world! ★ Visit your friends' reefs, and compare their collection of fish to your own! Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains social media links to connect with others, in-app purchases that cost real money, push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content, as well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies  and some third parties. In App Purchases from $0.99-$49.99 Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/
release_text: Minor bug fixes and optimized performance.

description: CHRISTMAS SPECIAL The same game than Luckiest Wheel, but now in special Christmas version. It has the same panels than the original one, but it looks more Christmas friendly and also has some Christmas special panels to guess. We hope you enjoy it and... MERRY CHRISTMAS! ;-) Solve as many panels as you can before the time's up! Make your self millionaire spinning the wheel! Win virtual dollars, or duplicate the available time, but be careful! you can also fall into bankrupt losing all your money, or get your time cut by half. Challenge your friends on multiplayer mode and show who is the clever one. Lauch the wheel sliding your finger over the yellow arrow. The more nexted panels you solve, the more money you will get to beat your own scores. DISCLAIMER: "The Luckiest Wheel" is NOT an official game from "The Wheel of Fortune" and it has no endorsement and no relationship with no TV show or TV channel. There is no help screens yet, although I think it is rather intuitive, here are a couple of tips: - You cannot solve the panel before discovering a given percent of the letters that varies with difficulty level. At that time the light bulb key will be enabled and you may use it to solve the panel. - To use vocals you must buy them and the price is $200 ($2000 from 1.7.1+) for each. So if you have less than such amount they will be disabled until you reach such quantity. - It uses no punctuation chars like ',', or '.', etc. so the genitive is formed without ' char, i.e. "Joe's car" will be shown as "Joes car" instead.

Settings is a free ad-supported app for quickly and easy set settings. The settings switches are interconnected with each other and are developed for maximum device compatibility. Settings has the most beautiful design and pixel perfect icons for high definition displays. It's optimized for smartphones and tablets. Download settings now! + Starts fast + Beautiful pixel perfect icons for high definition displays, unlike some other settings apps. + Elegant user interface that perfectly matches the Android system design + Settings switches are interconnected and made for maximum device compatibility + Optimized for smartphones and tablets + SDCard install support SOURCES Settings Logo Font: Zeroes by Ray Larabie, typodermicfonts.com
release_text: - New: Added a switch for the system settings. - New: Added a window that shows where the sidebar is located at and how to open it - Improved: Reduced the size of the app by 10% - Improved: Removed the permission "ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION" - Fixed: The mobile network switch now opens the right system preference window on Android 5. - Fixed: Removed the silent mode on Android 5 (Lollipop), because of the new priority mode.

description: Remember “back in the day” when you and your buddy would sit around and play hand-held electronic football? Well those great memories have been brought back with Creativity Driven's Retro Football for the Android powered phones and tablets. All of that same great football action and game play with updated graphics and sounds! Hear the crowd roar by marching your team down the field maneuvering through the opposition's defense to score a touchdown. This gridiron classic provides hours of fun for a single player, or go head-to-head with a friend in a turn-based style of game play! Retro Football is completely customizable allowing you to change Quarter Length, Difficulty and Sound. And for you Lefties out there, you can change the button layout giving you total control over your Retro Football experience. Best of all, Retro Football let's you check your stats giving you bragging rights with the results right there in black and white. And for those of you who are not sure how to play or even remember the electronic football games from the 70's and 80's, we've even built in a tutorial to help get you going. Look for other great games coming soon from Creativity Driven. Game Features: * Retro style game play reminiscent of the 70's and 80's hand-held electronic football games. * Customizable game options and button layout. * Three game difficulties: Rookie, Pro and All Star * Built in tutorial
release_text: Updated for the latest operating systems. Now operates on tablets and newer phones.

description: Gamebook Adventures returns for its fifth title! Please note that you do not need to have read any of the previous gamebooks in order to read and play this. The critically acclaimed series of newly imagined interactive fantasy gamebooks puts you, the reader, in control of the story! Along with a realistic dice-based battle system to fight creatures, an epic tale and beautiful artwork, Catacombs of the Undercity will give you many hours of gamebook adventuring! "Captured by one of Orlandes City’s most infamous brotherhoods, the Red Hand Guild, you are thrown to the mercy of the subterranean world deep beneath the streets of the great capital. Wading through the sewers and other dark menacing places, your goal is to reach Undercity, the City beneath the City! Only there can you find the help you need to escape this underground horror and bring down the dark brotherhood from within." "My favourite examples so far though are the iPad and iPhone-compatible Gamebook Adventures, a series of lovingly crafted and extremely well-written interactive fantasy novels. It's surprisingly engrossing stuff, the economically written narrative packing in masses of detail, while rattling out a pacey, involving story." - The Guardian "Catacombs of the Undercity is the best entry into the Orlandes series I’ve played yet. It’s exciting, atmospheric and even amusing at times, plus there are plenty more beasties to battle too." - iPhoneFreak (4/5) Gamebook Adventures 5: Catacombs of the Undercity is the fifth in a series of newly written adventure gamebooks for your Android device! We are completely original and not simply a re-print of old gamebooks. What is a Gamebook Adventure? Gamebook Adventures is brought together through the efforts of passionate and avid gamebook enthusiasts. If you are familiar with the Fighting Fantasy, Sorcery, Lone Wolf or Grail Quest series then Gamebook Adventures will really appeal to you. Our aim is to give those nostalgic readers of old something new and fresh, and bring a new exciting experience to those unfamiliar with gamebooks. If you enjoy fantasy RPGs or adventure games then this is for you! At their core, all of our gamebooks are compelling adventure stories where you get to choose how the adventure unfolds. Every section of the narrative concludes with choices that you have to make. The choices you make will alter the story, taking you down new paths and giving you new choices. Occasionally you will be presented with a situation that needs to be resolved with some dice rolling. The gamebook engine lets you throw 3D physics based dice that roll and bounce as if you were tossing them on a tabletop. Roll the dice to resolve combat by pitting your character against a myriad of enemies. Roll the dice to see if you were able to leap the gaping chasm, or pick the shopkeep’s pockets. Roll the dice to see if you won a bet, or caught the plague! Did you take a wrong turn? Or make some bad dice rolls? Then hopefully you put in a bookmark so that you can go back and try again! ----- If you want to keep up to date with the latest Gamebook news: Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/tinmangames Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/279362315466/ Visit the blog: http://tinmangames.com.au
release_text: Fixed an issue where devices with french or spanish as the default language could not load the game Fixed an issue where the bookmarks were not being properly applied in classic mode. Also fixed a heap of problems where the Random Rolls could behave incorrectly as combats. As always, if you have any troubles, let me know!

description: Toki Tori now available for Android! Toki Tori is a highly entertaining puzzle platformer like nothing you have seen before. Push your brain to the limit as you guide Toki Tori through 80 challenging levels spread over 4 mysterious worlds - collecting eggs as you go. You are armed with an arsenal of different items and weapons including the infamous Telewarp, InstantRock™ and Slug Sucker! Combine these to solve each ingenious level - some easy, some brain-bendingly difficult! Just some of the great features waiting for you: * Tailor-made multi-touch control scheme * A wide variety of items and weapons introduced gradually during the game * 80 levels spread over 4 large worlds * Dozens of hours of gameplay * For all ages - accessible and hard levels available * Catchy music and sound effects * Interactive cut-scenes *****Screen resolutions larger than 320x480 are required to play Toki Tori******
release_text: Toki Tori is back, and now supports the latest versions of Android! Note that this version will not import save progress from the previous version. If you have an older version with a save file, you will be given the option to downgrade if you install the new version so that you can keep your progress.

description: Looking for a great pill reminder app? Or, really any kind of reminder app? Sick of the ad-filled apps out there? Finally, an excellent reminder app has come to Android. Easily set weekly or daily reminders. Browse your schedule on the page on the right. Get beautiful, expandable notifications when it is reminder time, set your own reminder sound, and even get LED notifications. I think you will love it, so try it. I am making it free, and, if you like it, please leave a 5-star review for me.

갓피플닷컴(GODpeople.com)을 통해 방영되고 있는 설교와 찬양예배영상 그리고 추천소셜영상 등을 언제나 어디서나 시청(또는 청취)할 수 있는 어플입니다. 특히 " MP3다운" 서비스는 MP3파일을 내려받은 후, 출퇴근 또는 산책 등 언제 어디서든지 이용가능합니다. release_text: 2.8.2 - 유튜브 영상을 위한 전용 플레이어 적용 - 이전 페이지가 존재할 경우 백버튼으로 이전 페이지 이동 가능하도록 수정 2.8.0 - 추천 푸쉬 알림, 수신 여부 선택 기능 추가(환경설정) - 카카오톡 공유 기능 개선. 2.7.0 - 컨텐츠 UI 개편 - 추천/구독 알림 기능 추가 - 좋아요/SNS 기능 개선 2.4.5 - 카카오톡 API 업데이트 2.4.01 - [오늘의 테마] 페이지에서 SNS 공유가 잘 안되던 문제 수정. 2.4.0 - 갓피플 회원 로그인 프로세스 개선. - 영상파일을 다운로드 받은 상태에서 스트리밍 재생 시, 저장된 파일로 재생되도록 수정. 2.3.0 - 네이버밴드 공유기능 추가. 2.0.2 - 영상/음성 다운로드 후 재생시 최종 재생시점 이후부터 재생되도록 수정. - 갓피플 로그인 화면 디자인 수정. 2.0.0 - 전체적인 UI 변경. - 북마크 기능 추가. - 소셜영상(유투브) 등 풍부한 컨텐츠 추가. - SNS 공유기능 추가.

description: WARNING: Alert Responder is not a replacement of emergency calls like 911. This is only a tool among others to help you keep in touch with people in case of emergency or any other situations. Send SMS magic sentence and get back a simple feedback: OK or HELP and optionaly the GPS location (latitude and longitude). This application is bran new so be the very first to comment! Provide feedbacks to amwebexpert@gmail.com so we can improve the product! You want to follow the path of your friends who are a long hike? You want to ensure that your grandparents are doing well? You want to ensure that your teen is not lost? These are kind of scenarios that can be resolved... Alert Responder does not requires to be started in order to work. It is registered as an SMS receiver so Android system wakes up the application for incoming SMS messages. The application disables the keylock when receiving an incoming magic sentence, then re-enables the keylock when the response is completed. Note: Next release will include a preference to filter specific contacts allowed to request status ans location thus the permission required for the Android application to read contacts informations... Please provide feedbacks to amwebexpert@gmail.com so we can improve the product!

Play Air Hockey together with your friends and get a lot of fun! Playing on the same device brings much more fun and emotions than playing alone with anonymous in the internet. Even if you are alone, you can play with computer, you can choose the appropriate level of difficulty from easy to almost impossible to win. NO ADS!

SF robot battle adventure. All battle sequences are animated! Getting onto a robot called "Soragane" in electric world, fight against looming threat! - This is a RPG that you get onto "Soragane" and fight against the mysterious enemies which threaten electric world, while you explore the town to play adventure part as a main character. - In the adventure part, you can strengthen your robot. In the command-entering battles, you decide your strategy? standing position, formation etc. And use your skills to beat the enemies! - The battles are full-animated. Various elements that sophisticate the story such as library and linking with Twitter function are available! - A dojin game for PC which released in 2007, and downloaded more than 10,000 is now fully remade! Graphics and the system are renewed and new scenario has been added! And you can play in English! Total Play Time: more than 12 hours (depends on players) *This game will download over 800MB file in the after time of install. We recommend to connect Wi-Fi and clean up your storage in install. *"Soragane Lite" is free for play! (You can play first episode.) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ponpoko.srgn_lite If you have any opinions, thoughts, or questions about game strategy, E-mail: portal_ponpoko@yahoo.co.jp *If you have a question about game strategy, note the name of the title, as well. Our reply may take for a while if you contact us on weekend or holiday in Japan. If you have any question for developer, contact at: IES-NET.com Mikage Mikage@ies-net.com Other works from PON-POKO - PC game "Super Lightning Fatal Exclamation!" http://www.portal-ponpoko.com/fex/index.html -iPhone app "The Throne of the Rose King" http://www.geocities.jp/mu_ark/baraou/index.html

Hunt down the Mafia and bring them to justice! Step into your new Hummer 4x4 Police car and track down the Mafia. Pass a series of driving tests before you get your badge. There are 6 different levels to pass - each harder than the next. There is also one "Free for All" Level with jumps and other obstacles. Race against the clock to complete the missions before time expires. Easy to control for better drifting and racing. REALISTIC SCENERY Realistic looking 3D landscapes with trees, buildings, walls, and fences. Yes, even the fences look real. Amazing. REALISTIC EXPLOSIONS AND FUN JUMPS We tried to create the most realistic explosions possible. We use cones, ramps, barrels, and other barriers to keep the game as realistic as possible. Plenty of off-road 4x4 fun. REAL CARS We used ultra realistic 3D models in this game. Police Hummers and high end sports cars are used during the game. Cops driving 4x4 chasing bad guys in Sports cars. Does it get any better? REALISTIC MISSIONS Complete the mission to advance to the next level. There are 6 levels. You must race to complete the level before time expires. It includes One Bonus level that is a free for all level. Are these the Mexican Drug Cartel? Are these guy other Mafia members? You decide your own adventure. MULTIPLE VIEWS Decide to either be right behind the wheel, from the left or from the right. Multiple views helps you feel more in control when you go off-road. Shoot at targets from the left or from the right side. Go for it! Race to catch the criminals before they catch you. Have fun and be sure and send us your feedback.

Ellie - Help me out, please… is a free mystery horror puzzle game for Google play that challenges you to help Ellie find a way out from the room she is trapped in. Will you leave Ellie to her dark fate? Can you find the way out? Work together with Ellie to locate and use items that solve puzzles which will lead to her escape. You may also find the true secret that is hidden in this horror... Compatible with Android OS 2.3 or newer. You can also get "Another room" for more challenge. Same situation, but different gimmicks & puzzles. ++ Recommended games +++ Murder Room https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.atm.murderroom.android From the development team behind "Ellie - Help me out...please" DarkSummoner https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.darksummoner No.1 dark fantasy RPG.

Tap to flap your fins to swim! Can you reach a score of 999,999? • Catch bubbles to change colours • Challenge your friends in the leaderboards • Fun characters and beautiful environment • In-game music and commentary Splashy Fin (Flappy Surf Saga) - Surf and cut the despicable frozen ocean to clash with over 2048 angry reefs and crush the tiny hidden bubble in this survival saga!
release_text: * In-game music and commentary * Choose between male and female players * Catch bubbles to change colours * Challenge your friends' best scores in the leaderboards * Smoother gameplay on all devices

description: About the App Welcome to the upgraded version of the NUMBER ONE wedding planning app. This app includes many essential new features to make your wedding planning as easy as possible. It also features all the wedding planning tools offered at WedSpace.com, the most comprehensive wedding planning website in the U.S. This must-have wedding planning app also allows you to share your wedding details with your groom, parents, and wedding party. The info entered can be accessed on any other smartphone or tablet. It can also be accessed and edited via your WeddingSolutions.com and WedSpace.com accounts. This app is by far the most user-friendly and powerful wedding planning app on the market today. About the Company: Wedding Planning Complete was developed by Wedding Solutions, the largest wedding consulting company in North America. We have published over 60 of the best-selling wedding planning books, which have sold over 4 million copies to date. FREE Features: From a wedding countdown, to a detailed budget guideline and tracker, to customizable seating charts and guest lists, Wedding Planning Complete boasts countless features to make your wedding planning fun and simple, including: Wedding Countdown •Tells you how many days, hours, and seconds are left before your wedding. •Lets you share your countdown on Facebook and Twitter. Budget Tracker •Features the most comprehensive and easy-to-use wedding planning budget tool to keep you organized and within budget. Searchable Wedding Vendors •Provides detailed information about the top wedding planning vendors in your area. My Vendors •Helps you keep track of your wedding vendors with ease. Upgraded Features: Wedding Planning Checklist •Features every task you need to accomplish when planning the wedding of your dreams. •Includes helpful timeframes for when tasks should be completed. RSVPs •Lets you easily keep track of which guests are coming to the wedding. Seating Chart •Helps you assign guests to tables with ease. Wedding Planning Book •Includes countless tips and guides from America’s best-selling wedding planner, the Easy Wedding Planner and Organizer. •Provides everything you need to know to plan a beautiful, memorable, and unique wedding.

Knowtulus Biology demo is a free application for all the students preparing for AIPMT, MHT-CET exam. The application has various exciting features which will help you prepare for exam. The application helps in self assessment on subject level or Topic level, the demo version has around 1000 questions, You can upgrade to fulll version to get more questions. You get graphical reports, You can check your performance history, Get detailed explaination of all the required questions, a great application to utilize your mobile to prepare for exam. We wish you good luck with your studies

A Dungeon-Crawling, Monster-Slaying, Loot-Hoarding Adventure! RISK & REWARD COMBAT, utilizing 6 different damage types • Unlock skills by progressing through the tower, gaining XP and earning levels. • Pick a set of 3 Battle Abilities, select your weapons and armor and head into the tower to seek your fortune. • Strategize the most effective build, risk a lot and win big! CHALLENGING FOES! • Face powerful enemies who will test your mettle. • Bide your time or swing big, to your utter destruction or victory. FUSE AND POWER UP! • Fuse an ordinary weapon to make it extraordinary. • Level your gear to its max and then fuse it to bring out its true potential. • Take your Common sword and turn it into one of the Ultimate Weapons using materials you discover in the tower. CREATE A TEAM, UNLOCK REWARDS! • Exchange friend codes with people you know playing the game, and form a team. • Earn gold and rewards as you and your friends level up! PLUS: • Check back each day for different challenges and chest events • 1000s of Unique Items to Collect • Find and Collect Dozens of Unique Character Avatars • Climb the tower and challenge the dragon! • Daily challenges • Special events • Gain xp and level up to equip more powerful items • Monthly/weekly/daily dungeons • Try your luck with the ornate chest! Note: Finder’s Keep is FREE to download and play. There are in-app purchases available. In-app purchases may be disabled within your system settings. *A network connection is required to play.
release_text: - New challenges await beyond Dread Landing in the Heroic Tower! - 4 new VI difficulty boss challenges! - 2 new Special Dungeon series with unique features and loot! - Hundreds of new items with powerful new Passive Abilities! - Changed “Rapid Strikes” and “Chance to Reduce Hit” proc chance from 5% to 10% - “Thorns: Major” reduced to 4000 damage - “Soul Sacrifice” - Cooldown is now 0 (damage is now based off of the player's remaining hp %)

description: This is a live wallpaper inspired by the beautiful Russian flag Your screen is transformed to a liquid surface. Touch the screen to create ripples and waves. You can customize the size of the ripples and other characteristic of the live wallpaper. Feel proud of your country? have the Russian flag always on your phone!

Dashboard Cam - Widget, Compass Map, GPS Data, Remote Controller, External GPS Support NEW: Remote Screen Sharing mode (bluetooth, wifi, and desktop pc mode) added. Google Play Service update (6.0.4) Download PC application for screen sharing modes: visit at http://www.busywww.com Screen Capture Mode (with Video and Sound recording). On Top Service Mode with screen recording option. (6.0.1) Android Wear support. Remote app operations and gps data view, remote map views with zoom in and out. http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamwear.aspx *** New Promotion Codes *********************************************** To get the promotion code, please visit the developer web site about more information. Only a promotion code would be available for the each user (first come first serve). Web Site: http://www.busywww.com ******************************************************************************* * On Top Mode (Always stay on over the other running apps), with this mode, user could record video and gps data while using the other apps; like google navigator, google map, or other apps. For more Info please visit link for the visual help: http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamhelpontop.aspx For video demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGC1QUgOv8k * GPS Data and Video Web Browser Player: please visit http://www.busywww.com * User can play and view recorded gps data from web browsers (recommend to use latest Chrome) 1. OBD Mode (Vehicle On Board Diagnostics): Vehicle Speed, RPM, and Engine Temperature 2. Google Map Version 2: Off-line Map and 3D View support 3. Sharing Current GPS Location: Email or other applications *** OBD Mode: see Help OBD Mode section for more information. Dashboard Cam allows the users to record video or take photo snaps in full screen camera images along with map compass and GPS speed information, and find out your driving statistics with GPS data recordings. And app could be used as car blackbox purposes. Widget Video Help (YouTube): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AyT2k3-Xupo KitKat Screen Record Sample: http://youtu.be/_B-7q4vH59w Dashboard Cam Widget is miniature application view that can be embedded in the Home screen. With widget, without the opening main application, user can display current GPS Speed and record the GPS data on demand. While widget app gps recording is running, user could open or use other applications without interrupting the gps service. Dashboard Cam android application could be controlled from remote android devices with realtime remote camera frame viewing. Remote control functions might be very useful: 1. When the android device is docked (or, located) at the places where hand controlling is limited. 2. Control the remote dashboard cam application from hard-mounted tablet devices. 3. Control the remote dashboard cam by another person who could not reach the remote device. For more information, please check following link. http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamremotehelp.htm Dashboard Cam supports external bluetooth gps. With external gps, the gps data accuracy will be improved in good rates. And it would be very useful in various situations. 1. Gps signal acquiring will be improved a lot. 2. Useful under the circumstances like forest, downtown city, or similar locations where gps signal is weak or blocked. 3. For the android devices without real gps devices or only with a-gps function, user now could enjoy all the application functions. For more information visit following link: http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcamgpshelp.htm Record Player with Overlay Customization Application includes special player and viewer for the specific purposes for the application. With player, user could view and play back recored images in animated format in full screen. With photo + gps data records, user could view or generate map + speed overlaied recordings later on. For the overlaied recording view, display and record settings are available for customized playback experiences.
release_text: Remote Screen Sharing WiFi mode and Desktop PC application mode added. (6.0.4) Download PC Application at the help web page. More info: http://www.busywww.com Android Wear support. http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcam.aspx *** On Top Mode: http://www.busywww.com/dashboardcam.aspx *** GPS Data Web Browser Player: please visit http://www.busywww.com *** Item Size and Move: Long Press (speedo, time, status, zoom, record button, translucent map), Double Tap (map)

app_name: N2 TTS用追加声質データ(男声A)
description: 「N2 TTS」用の追加声質データです。「N2 TTS」がインストールされた端末に、さらに本パッケージを追加でインストールすることにより、「N2 TTS」に読み上げ調の男声声質5種類が追加されます。 【対応バージョン】 N2 TTS 1.4.7以降 (本パッケージの利用には、Android 4.0以降が必要です。) 【使用方法】 「N2 TTS」がインストールされた端末に、本パッケージを追加でインストールしてください。 【利用規約について】 本パッケージが提供するデータは「N2 TTS利用規約」における「コンテンツ」に該当します。 「N2 TTS利用規約」は「N2 TTS」の「N2 TTS 設定」→「利用規約」でご確認いただけます。また、利用規約はKDDI研究所ホームページにも掲載しております: http://www.kddilabs.jp/products/audio/n2tts/ 【外部への情報送信について】 本アプリケーションは、入力されたテキスト及びその統計情報(単語出現頻度等)、声質選択履歴及び選択頻度情報を含め、端末からお客様情報を外部に送信することはございません。 【Twitterアカウント】 http://twitter.com/n2tts It is an additional voice data for the "N2 TTS". In the "N2 TTS" is installed terminal, by installing further add this package, it will be added male voice quality five-tone reading the "N2 TTS". [Corresponding version] N2 TTS 1.4.7 or later (The use of this package, you must have Android 4.0 or later.) 【how to use】 In the "N2 TTS" is installed terminal, please install this package in addition. About Terms of Use] Data provided by this package apply to "content" in the "N2 TTS Terms of Use". "N2 TTS Terms of Use" is "N2 TTS Settings" in the "N2 TTS" → You can check in the "Terms of Use". In addition, Terms of Use, we have also posted in KDDI R & D Laboratories Homepage: http://www.kddilabs.jp/products/audio/n2tts/ [For information transmission to an external] This application, the entered text and the statistical information (word appearance frequency, etc.), including the voice selection history and the selected frequency information, there is no possible to send your information to the outside from the terminal. [Twitter account] http://twitter.com/n2tts

Roar! Take a step back into a prehistoric world for a roaring good time with dinosaurs, dino eggs, dinosaur sounds and dinosaur flash cards. Zip Zoom Media is proud to introduce the Dinosaur Games For Toddlers Activity App! Your budding paleontologist will have a awesome jurassic time playing with dino games, a dino fun cam, and learning the real dinosaur names with dino flashcards in this activity app designed for ages 2 & up. Play... 9 DINOSAUR FLASH CARDS- Hear the names of the dinosaurs and see realistic pictures of them. 12 DINO SOUNDS- Hear them roar and see the cute cartoon dinosaurs play in their prehistoric world. 4 DINOSAUR MATCHING GAMES- Test your memory and dinosaur knowledge. DINO THROW GAME- Launch rocks at dinosaur eggs in this engaging game. DINOSAUR FUN CAM- Take a picture with dinosaurs in the super fun interactive feature. Dinosaur Flashcards The toddler dinosaur games activity app features 9 interactive dinosaur flashcards! When your little one taps a dino sound flashcard that including a stegosaurus, t-rex, and more the flashcard will speak the correct pronunciation. Dino Sounds Take your little ones back into prehistoric times with the dinosaur games for kids sounds. So cute the funny cartoon dinosaurs will delight them with cool and funky dino noises. Hear and enjoy the cartoon dinosaurs roar, throw eggs, swim, and more, including an awesome t-rex sound and baby dino's hatching! Dinosaur Match Games Uncover more layers of fun in the dinosaur toddler games activity app with the 4 different dino matching games! The dinosaur match games are very entertaining and designed for ages 2 & up, and playing dinosaur games for babies memory will also encourage learning concepts. NEW: Dinosaur Train Match. Dino Throw Game Have a blast playing with rocks in this cute and sometimes addictive preschool dinosaur game. Your little one will get 4 tries to knock down the dinosaur eggs and then they will have to start over. And when they win they will see a cool dino do a victory dance for them! Dinosaur Fun Cam Dig in for some real fun with the dinosaurs for toddlers fun cam! When the play button is pressed it will take you to a screen with a dino- land frame so you can take a picture with the dinosaurs! There are 3 different frames included and to find the other dinosaur scenes simply swipe the screen. Learn... -Early language skills. -Fine motor skills. -Reasoning and concept development. -Memory and recognition skills. -Hand eye coordination. -Early math concepts. -Color recognition and vocabulary. *Most importantly...Dinosaur knowledge! Design Team: Nancy, Thomas, Deborah, Jake, and Sam. Get ready to take a trip back in time and have a blast playing with dinosaurs and learning the dinosaurs names in the Dinosaur Games For Toddlers Activity App and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n' Learn App!
release_text: New dino flash cards & sounds! Have fun and thanks for your support :-)

description: An UNIQUE game to let kids to coloring bunny pictures just like doodle on real paper! The user experience is TOTALLY different with most other coloring games on google paly store, which just let kids to tap picture to fill blocks with color. There's a happy rabbit family, daddy, mommy, little brother bobo, and little sister coco. They love each other so much, and enjoy their happy life in a beautiful small town. description: FTP Server is an File Transfer Protocol server for Android that will let you to manage files and folders on your device without the USB cable. Унылая остановка общественного транспорта. Дождь, мокро, холодно и мерзко. Когда же наконец придет долгожданный автобус? Программа «Spb Transport Online» поможет сохранить оптимизм даже в такой непростой ситуации - ведь вы будете точно знать, где находится тот автобус, который вы ждете. О программе С помощью GPS определяется ваше местоположение и выводится карта с ближайшим транспортом. Причем не маршруты или остановки - автобусы, трамваи и троллейбусы показываются на карте именно там, где они сейчас находятся. Подобное чудо (а иначе это и не назовешь) стало возможным, когда в Санкт-Петербурге запустился в работу портал общественного транспорта. Теперь практически на каждом автобусе стоит система мониторинга GLONASS и данные по местоположению транспорта доступны всем петербуржцам в реальном режиме времени. !!!Обращаем внимание:!!! 1. Приложение Spb Transport Online получает данные с государственного портала общественного транспорта Санкт-Петербурга и работает ТОЛЬКО в Санкт-Петербурге. 2. Портал уже несколько лет работает только в тестовом режиме. Далеко не все маршруты и отдельные транспортные средства оснащены GLONASS оборудованием. Так же наблюдаются перебои в работе и различные задержки при выводе местоположения. И от нас, как от разработчиков приложения, ничего не зависит. 3. Маршрутки - коммерческий транспорт и не отображаются на государственном портале. Поэтому добавить маршрутки в приложение нет возможности. 4. Единственная цель данного приложения - выводить на экран смартфона данные с портала. Абсолютно все действия и вычисления (местоположение транспорта, построение маршрутов, вывод времени прибытия) рассчитываются порталом. Если запрашиваемых Вами данных нет на портале (к которому мы не имеем отношения), в приложении их так же будет невозможно увидеть. 5. В связи с единственно возможной технологией получения данных от портала (в виде скриншотов экрана по размеру видимой области карты) на устройствах с большим разрешением экрана значки транспорта будут отображаться достаточно мелко. К сожалению, мы ничего не можем с этим сделать. 6. Так как мы не имеем отношения к порталу, Ваши отзывы никуда не передаются и не читаются сотрудниками портала. Хотите что-то улучшить в работе гос. портала? Пишите напрямую работникам портала. Адрес государственного портала комитета по транспорту г. Санкт-Петербурга: http://transport.orgp.spb.ru/Portal/transport/main Порядок работы После старта программы определяются GPS-координаты и карта позиционируется в том месте, где вы находитесь. Если же вы находитесь не в Санкт-Петербурге, то режим определения местоположения вам не пригодится - просто не включайте его, а если случайно включили, то выключить можно на странице настроек. Данные на карте обновляются при каждом перемещении карты, либо при нажатии кнопки «Обновить». На странице настроек можно выбрать и автоматическое обновление - в этом случае данные будут обновляться каждые 10 секунд. Если у вас возникли проблемы с корректной работой приложения: 1. Автор приложения не имеет отношения к гос-порталу общественного транспорта Санкт-Петербурга и не отвечает за качество работы портала. 2. Если вы не видите транспорт в приложении, то зайдите на сайт портала - а есть ли он там? Если там транспорт не виден, то значит у них что-то перестало работать. Скорее всего это временно, попробуйте позже. 3. Если на портале транспорт есть, а в программе не видно - проверьте Ваше соединение с интернет. 4. Проверьте включены ли настройки получения местоположения видов транспорта. 5. Если на портале транспорт есть, с интернетом все в порядке, нужные кнопки активны, а в программе все-равно не видно транспорт, то зайдите на наш форум: http://livegpstracks.com/forum/ и задайте свой вопрос в теме приложения. Или напишите свой вопрос в службу технической поддержки: support@livegpstracks.com О создателях Программа создана сотрудниками сервиса GPS/ГЛОНАСС Мониторинга LiveGPStracks.com при поддержке Mультикарт - mmaps.net Sad to public transport. Rain, wet, cold and disgusting. When it finally comes the long-awaited bus? Program «Spb Transport Online» will remain optimistic even in such a difficult situation - because you'll know exactly where the bus that you wait. About the program With GPS detects your location and displays map with the nearest transport. And do not stop or routes - buses, trams and trolley buses are shown on the map exactly where they are now. Such a miracle (otherwise it will not name) became possible when in St. Petersburg started a portal of public transport. Now, almost every bus stands and monitoring system GLONASS data by location transport available to all St Petersburg in real time. !!! Please note: !!! 1. Annex Spb Transport Online receives data from the State Portal of public transport in St. Petersburg and worked only in St. Petersburg. 2. The portal has several years of experience in the test mode. Not all the routes and certain vehicles equipped with GLONASS equipment. As well there are disruptions and delays in the derivation of the various locations. And from us as to the application developers do not depend. 3. Minibuses - commercial vehicles and are not displayed on the public portal. Therefore, add a minibus in the application there is no possibility. 4. The sole purpose of this application - display a smartphone data portal. Everything and calculations (location of transport, construction of routes, the output time of arrival) is calculated by the portal. If you request no data on the portal (to which we have no relationship), the application of the same will not be seen. 5. In view of the unique capabilities of the technology receive data from the portal (in the form of screenshots on the size of the visible area of ​​the map) on devices with higher resolution screen will display the icons of transport shallow enough. Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do about it. 6. Since we have no relationship to the portal, your comments will not be transmitted or read by the staff of the portal. Do you want to improve something in the state. portal? Write directly to employees of the portal. Address State Portal of the Transport Committee of St. Petersburg: http://transport.orgp.spb.ru/Portal/transport/main Operation After the start of the program are determined by GPS-coordinates and map positioned in the place where you are. If you are not in St. Petersburg, the positioning mode is not useful to you - just do not turn it on, and if you accidentally enabled, disable the settings on the page. The data on the map updated every move the map, or when you click "Update". On the settings page, you can choose to automatically update - in this case, the data will be updated every 10 seconds. If you have any problems with the operation of the program: 1. The author of the application is not related to the state of public transport portal of St. Petersburg and is not responsible for the quality of the portal. 2. If you do not see the trucks in the application, then log on to the website - and is it not there? If there is transport is not visible, it means that they have something stopped working. Most likely it is temporary, try again later. 3. If there is a portal of transportation, and the program is not visible - check your Internet connection. 4. Check whether the settings are included obtaining location modes. 5. If there is a portal of transportation, with the Internet all right, right buttons are active, and the program anyway can not see traffic, then go to our forum: http://livegpstracks.com/forum/ and ask your question in the subject line application. Or email your question to Customer Support: support@livegpstracks.com Creators                      The program was created by employees of service of GPS / GLONASS Monitoring LiveGPStracks.com supported by Multikart - mmaps.net

description: This is RSS reader app offering perfect functions. You can watch or listen to approximately 4,000 podcasts around the world. This app supports all kinds of contents including audio/video files, text articles as well as comics. You can easily watch or listen to any contents you want whenever, wherever. It's simple and free! 0. Overall introduction - Grey, the main color of the app, helps your eyes not to get tired - This app is named 'Grey' as it makes use of grey tone overall - You can find a side menu bar when you touch and slide aside 1. Podcast search - You can search approximately 4,000 podcasts around the world - You can search by name, category and country. - You can see how many people are listening to each podcast 2. Favorites - You can easily and quickly add your favorite channels you would like to watch or listen to among about 4,000 podcasts. - You can see your favorite channels of each category immediately - You can change sorting order of episodes 3. Episodes - You can set the total number of search results in a list - You can register download or play lists - You can check up on download status - With a side menu bar, you can easily move to menu (function) - You can use external players 4. Player - The screen UI is simple and intuitive - A volume control button is available - Sleep Timer will automatically turn the player off when you fall asleep while listening to a podcast. - On play list, it is easy to move from previous file or to next file. 5. Settings - You can set up the time of rewinding and fast forwarding - You can set whether you want to delete image cashes or not - You can set up automatically to look up episodes - You can change the location of a folder in which the downloaded files are saved * keyword podcast, allpodcast, allpod, allpodcast2, allpod2, allpodcast season 2

description: Get ready for intense web-slinging action with The Amazing Spider-Man! Join Spidey in the official game app of this highly anticipated 2012 blockbuster! Play through the movie storyline as Spider-Man faces off against the Lizard and rampaging gangs. Web-sling and crawl your way through an open, fully 3D New York while using your amazing skills to save the city. ** Note that The Amazing Spider-Man needs 2GB of free memory to install ** THE OFFICIAL GAME OF 2012’s HIGHLY AWAITED SUPER HERO BLOCKBUSTER • Fight the Lizard and his minions to put a stop to his dark schemes. • Play The Amazing Spider-Man through more than 25 immersive missions inspired by the upcoming movie's storyline. • Climb, jump and web-sling from building to building for an aerial thrill like never before! FREE NEW YORK CITY • Explore the city through its five distinctive districts (Central Park, Business, Downtown, Pier and Residential) • An exciting and enjoyable fighting system with melee, ranged, combo attacks and much more • A wide selection of upgrades to customize your style, attacks and skills A HIGH PRODUCTION-VALUE GAME • Explore an open-world Manhattan, teeming with action. Discover random missions, collectibles and more secrets in the City that Never Sleeps! • Fight in a fully 3D New York City with cutting-edge graphics. • Advanced shaders and visual effects make Spiderman more realistic than ever before! Minimum hardware requirements to play The Amazing Spider-Man: - 1 GHz CPU - 512 MB RAM - PowerVR SGX540 GPU or equivalent - 1.5 GB of free space on the device For optimal performance, we recommend restarting your device and closing other applications before playing The Amazing Spider-Man. ---- Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles. ROOT IS REQUIRED Memory Locker prevents running applications from being killed. Android sometimes kills any running application because of low memory and Memory Locker helps to prevent it. Lots of Android users have problem with launcher, it is annoying when your launcher is killed and then it takes some time to restart it, so in this case Memory Locker can reduce risk or fully prevent it from being killed. You can select which applications you want to prevent from being killed. This feature is also very useful for widgets on your home screen, because you can reduce risk that your widgets will stop to run. Memory Locker controls file in /data directory and also controls system files in root for setting oom_adj for all running processes. All locked applications are automatically locked after each reboot, so you do not need to lock your applications again after each reboot. For full functionality please do not touch local.prop file in /data directory. ★Languages - English, Russian Twitter: https://twitter.com/Juwe11 Google+: https://www.google.com/+AdamJuva Official XDA thread: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2366619 ANY BUG OR ISSUE REPORT BY EMAIL PLEASE

Mobile phones normally can't be used when cellular networks fail, for example during a disaster. This means that millions of vulnerable people around the world are deprived of the ability to communicate, when they need it most. We have spent the past four years working with the New Zealand Red Cross to create a solution. We call it the Serval Mesh, and it is free software that allows smart-phones to communicate, even in the face of catastrophic failure of cellular networks. It works by using your phone's Wi-Fi to communicate with other phones on the same network. Or even by forming impromptu networks consisting only of mobile phones. Mesh communications is an appropriate technology for complementing cellular networks. Think of it like two-way radio or CB radio that has been propelled into the 21st century. For long-range communications you will still need to make use of cellular or fixed telephone networks or the internet. This software allows you to easily make private phone calls, send secure text messages and share files in caves, in subways, in the Outback, in Australia or Africa, in Europe or the United States -- even when cellular networks fail or are unavailable. You can also keep using your existing phone number on the mesh, which is really important in a disaster when people are trying to get back in contact with each other. Our software: * Is completely open and open-source; free for all * Can be carried and activated in seconds by those who need it when it is needed * Is carrier independent * Can be installed during an emergency from only one phone * Is distributed nature makes network resilient * Can use your existing phone number * Encrypts mesh phone calls and mesh text messages by default * Can distribute pictures, videos and any other files
release_text: 0.92 * MeshMS text messages display delivery notifications and timestamps, and only stored encrypted, but are not backwards compatible * Vastly simplified the connection screen * Added phone dialler for tablet users * Our routing protocol has been improved * The Peer List is more responsive to changing network conditions * Reduced power consumption in a number of use cases For a complete list of changes, see https://github.com/servalproject/batphone/blob/master/CURRENT-RELEASE.md

description: Crystallight Defense is a "tower defense" game with online ratings and hours of exciting gameplay. Mix crystals and force waves, use obstacles and mines! Defend castle by castle in Campaign Mode or play in Battle mode with personal setup. The game features: - 40 unique maps (you can replay each to get a higher score) - 4 base types of crystals, that can be mixed with each other to get unique effects - 15 kinds of monsters - 2 game modes - enchanced online score system (6 tables + table for each castle and user profiles) - tutorial game level - you can always learn how to play, it's easy! ***Game Rules*** Underground Forge produces Iron Monsters of Mech Lord, wave by wave and they run to the castle. The Forge has a wave indicator that shows the order number of the next wave and time remained before it will be activated. Your goal is to destroy all monsters before they reach the castle and break the Magic Shield. Plug Magic Crystals to towers, and they will shoot at monsters. When you destroy a monster, you get some mana. Use mana to build new towers and other objects, mix and enchant Crystals etc. Be careful: if mana storage is full, received mana will be lost. So spend mana in time. ***Wave forcing*** By default waves of monsters go one by one. But you can force the wave: tap the Underground Forge. You’ll get much score points for all spared time, but the wave will be activated almost immediately and battle will become harder! Wave forcing is necessary to get an Award! ***Create, Enchant and Mix Crystals*** Touch the Crystals palette and then select type of a crystal. The central large cell is a Magic Cell. Use it to mix Crystals. Power and effects of mixing Crystals are merged. When crystals of the same color are mixed, they merge their attack power and effects with better result, but when you mix crystals of different colors you create crystal with multiple effects. It’s very useful to enchant crystals. Click on crystal to select it and then press one of the buttons: 'Increase range of crystal' (crystal can attack enemies from longer distance) and 'Increase firing speed' (crystal shoots more frequently). When 2 crystals of the same level are mixed, level of the crystal becomes higher. Level of the Crystal restricts enchanting abilities of the Crystal, e.g. a range of Crystal of level 2 can be increased to +3, but for level 3 it is +6. Max level is 5. ***In-game Help*** To get info in game just draw a circle by your finger touch an object, for example, a tower. Want more info? You can find fully illustrated game description on our site: smartpixgames.com!

description: This is a simple open-source notepad app which demonstrates the capability of the SQLCipher for Android encrypted database library. All notes created and stored by this app are saved fully secured using industry standard 256-bit AES encryption. They are never stored in an unencrypted state on the disk, only in memory. SQLCipher is an SQLite extension that provides transparent 256-bit AES encryption of database files. To date, the core library has been open-sourced, sponsored and maintained by Zetetic LLC, and it was ported to Android in 2011 by the Guardian Project. ★ WE SPEAK YOUR LANGUAGE: NoteCipher is available for friends who speak: Catalan, (Català), English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), Norwegian (Bokmål), Spanish (Español), Turkish (Türkçe), and Vietnamese (Tiếng Việt). Don’t see your language? Join us and help translate the app: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/notecipher/ ***Please Report Bugs*** This is a big project, so bugs are inevitable. Help us improve this software by filing bug reports about any problem that you encounter. Feature requests are also welcome! https://github.com/guardianproject/notecipher/issues ***Learn More*** ★ ABOUT US: Guardian Project is a group of developers that make secure mobile apps and open-source code for a better tomorrow. ★ OUR WEBSITE: https://GuardianProject.info . ★ CHAT WITH US: we want feedback! Find us on IRC: #guardianproject on freenode and oftc ★ ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/guardianproject . ★ OPEN-SOURCE: Our code is transparent. You can take a look or join the community to help make Notecipher even better https://github.com/guardianproject/notecipher ★ FREE SOFTWARE: We operate under the GNU General Public License (GPLv3+) https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html

description: Apk Installer App or Apk Installer for android Apk installer allows you to install applications(.apk) from your external storage (e.g. SD card). Easy & fastest tool to install apps(.apk) from SD card. It has the following features:- Features:- *Appinstaller from memory card. *cache apk data for speeding loading during next time. *Install apps from SD card *Uninstall apps from phone. *Easy interface. *show free and total internal and sdcard storage. *Auto backup of apps when a new app is installed(pro only). *Delete apps from SD card *Batch install & delete *Filter apps by name *sort by name,size and date. *Send apps to friends by email *Send links to friends. *View details of app. *Search apps in Google Market *Apkinstaller android for android 1.5 phone. **************************************************************** ANKITTHEDEV, Make Smartphone Experience Even Better! **************************************************************** #Description AppInstaller is a tool to install apps from apk files on SD card. It will list all the apk files on the SD card, and you can select apps that want to install, and click "Install" button to install them. you can click "Menu"->"Sort" to sort apps in different sort types. Long click on the specified app in the list, there will be a poped up context menu to provide more options. You can send the apk files by email by click "Send", and you can search the app in the google market by click "Search Google Market". Any problem, it is better to send feedback to us to get help then 1 star! To help me translate this app to your native language, please mail me, thank you very much! #KW app installer, apk installer,appinstaller This app will add a few search access points on your device. If you do not want to use this new search page, you can either ignore it or delete it. If you do use it, we get a few cents and it will help us a lot to keep developing more apps. If you don’t, you can delete it and no harm is done (our app remains the same, no need to uninstall it!). Thank you.

An easy to use alphabet app that will help teach children letters and shapes in a fun interactive way. The unique locking feature will keep your child in the app and not let them mess up your phone settings or get into apps you don't want them to access. Features: ☆ Toddler/child lock. ☆ Easy to use design for young children. ☆ Max Volume setting (For parents peace of mind). ☆ Letters and Shapes. ☆ Fun animations and sounds. ☆ Lock works on Ice Cream Sandwich. (NOTE: Free version WILL open browser or go to android market if an ad is clicked. Get Alphabet Zoo Pro for full locking feature.) Every effort has been made to insure age appropriate ads. Before Letting your child use your phone we recommend setting a pin code on the Google Play app. This will keep your child from accidentally purchasing apps. This can be set up by opening the play store, going to the settings menu and clicking "set or change pin"

The Photo Slide Puzzle is an easy, very funny and entertaining game. It´s a free game, consisting in moving the pieces to the correct square in order to assemble the picture. The pieces con be moved to the square next to them, if it is not occupied by another piece, that means you can only move a piece to an empty square. To move a piece, only slide it towards the empty square. At the end, the empty square must be in the down right corner. The sliding puzzle is a classical puzzle game for any ages, enjoyed by children and adults. Resolve the puzzle choosing a photo from your gallery or making one with your camera. You can also use one of the fantastic photos which are included in the game. This game is totally free and is available in the following languages: English Spanish German The game has three funny styles: - Classic style: Enjoy playing many levels of each world. - Time trial style: Resolve the puzzle before time finishes. - Choose your photo style: a free style, where you choose the difficulty, the board size and the photo (making a photo with your camera or choosing one from your gallery). Play with your own photos!!! After finishing a level, the score you got and a complete statistic with information about your best time, the number of movements, as well as your worst time and average value of all games played on this level will be showed. When you exit a game, the state of the puzzle will be automatically saved. So you can continue whenever you want. Make up different challenges to unblock achievements and obtain trophies. You like games like puzzles and ability games? Then you will like the Slide Puzzle. Play and enjoy at the same time you are doing brain training and improving your intelligence. This popular game is also known as 15 puzzle, slide puzzle, sliding puzzle, sliding block puzzle, sliding tile puzzle, the 15, fifteen puzzle, gem puzzle, the magic puzzle square, boss puzzle, game of fifteen, mystic square. The game can be personalized on the preference screen, suitable to the preferences of every player. Size and color of the pieces can be changed on the preferences menu to make them more visible. To increase the difficulty of the game, players who want more new challenges can hide the numbers. The game works perfectly on tablets and mobile phones. The creators of Memory launch a new game: the Photo Slide Puzzle. The game provides beautiful photos from different countries: Ireland, France, Belgium, Austria… The permission to access storage is necessary to store photos made with the camera and use them in the puzzle. The permission to access internet is used for publicity and for an anonymous private statistic of the game´s use. Please, let us know your opinion and suggestions about the game in order to improve it. If you are a google+ user and you like the game, please press 1+ button. So you will help us to improve and to create more games. Thank you!!! If something doesn´t work or if you want to let us know your suggestions, please write us an e-mail.

description: Best Slender Man Game for Android with over 5 000 000 registered players worldwide! Join Slender Man Origins Community! What people say: Chris: " Omg I love it :) best Slenderman game ever it scared me i screamed like pewdiepie! " Blake: " By far the best game ever!I thought it was going to be like the normal crapy slender man games but that was a mistake!!!There's a story line to it! If you don't believe that this is the best game yet try me! " Gregory: " YAY!!! I died!!!!! I finally found him after 5 min. of playing, and I refuse to look away from him... and I died...in forest " Austin: " To sum this app up in 2 words, horrifying & outstanding! :D Wow! The controls are perfect! I for one am a Huge Slender Man fan, and This is practially everything i have EVER wanted out of a Slender Man game app!! :D " Philip: " This Slender game is the best I've ever played good graphics creepy song it really sets the mood " _____ Slender Man Origins - Immerse yourself into the thick atmosphere of mystery and horror! Follow the Slender Man's trail, become a witness to his horrific deeds and save the children from their inevitable doom. Explore, listen and look closely, travel through the dark corridors, damp halls, dense forests and empty streets, among the ancient tombs, old looming trees and abandoned houses. But beware! Slender Man is near! In your journey you will encounter many things without explanation, some even seeking to harm you. Always remember that every step you take may well be your last - for the Slender Man watches you... - Four different, atmospheric locations Each of the locations is unique, complete with a certain theme and filled with detail. - Variable ambience Explore while experiencing different weather conditions, adding a certain feel to each of your journey. - Enviroment The Slender Man isn't the only thing you shall notice out there. While some events may simply be a part of unexplainable, many of them mean danger, some may bar your way, while few others can even prove lethal. Be ready for surprises! - Easy and quick-to-learn controls Move around and explore the way you are most used to - you can always choose a more familiar control scheme from the options menu. Run away from Slender Man easily! - Use the headphones! 3D sound makes the atmosphere even more mysterious, while listening to the directions of noises you can often get a feel of where you should go, or even avoid a hazard. - Smooth, pleasant graphics Fine detail, soft light and lots of objects, as well as shadows from every tree, stone and iron bar in a fence - you are sure to itch for a few screenshots along the way. www.facebook.com/HorrorSlender www.slendermanorigins.com twitter.com/bigzurgames

Wow, Libii’s newest Salon game is coming everybody, thanks for your patient waiting for such a long time, and we know how much you love our Salon games!!! Now, please cheer and applause to welcome our “Ballet Salon”, which most of you have told us you want to own such a dress up game very very much! Finally your suggestion is turned into reality, you can do spa, make up and dress up 4 elegant ballerinas ------ Valencia, Doria, Patricia and Johana, yes, they are the new characters in our Ballet Salon! In this app, you’ll experience the ballerina’s amazing life by walking along the colorful street, if you like, you can bring the ballerina into the spa room to have a relax, or enter Libii Beauty room to help her make up before the perform, also, you can take her to the Costume Store to try on countless pretty ballet dresses and decorations, moreover, you can enter her dance classroom to watch her practicing ballet, finally, you can take her to the theatre or ballet park to see her performing on the shining stage with romantic music, that’s so wonderful that you’ll never forget such a scene! Therefore, if you really love ballet and admire ballerina, join our Ballet Salon now and start your unforgettable ballet journey! How To Play: Open Ballet Salon, choose a ballerina you like most to start the game, then you’ll find her appearing on a colorful street. Along the street you’ll see a few rooms, in sequence they are the SPA room, in which the ballerina can have a relaxing spa to make sure her hair and skin are flawless already to dance on the stage. Next, you’ll see Libii Beauty Room, here you can help her choose a hair style, eye color and put the makeup on. After that, you’ll come to the Costume Store and assist her to select an amazing ballet dress(or ballet top and skirt, etc.), gloves, stockings, ballet shoes, and the matched accessories (including necklace, earrings, bracelet and headgear). Then you can also enter her dance classroom to watch her practicing. At last, you will see the Libii Theatre and Ballet Park where the ballerina will perform, she will show up confidently and dance on the beautiful stage, let's see how amazing she is! Features: This time the background is a complete street contains various rooms you can walk around (Special Launch and Surprise! Strongly Recommend to have a try !!!) Spa Room Libii Beauty Room Costume Store Dance Classroom Libii Theatre Ballet Park 4 elegant ballerinas of different skin color to choose Many beautiful hair styles and hair colors to choose Try on dozens of different eye colors, eyeliners, eye-shadows, mascaras, lipsticks, and more A lot of pretty ballet dresses, tops, skirts to choose A huge variety of decoration items, including earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and headgears to choose Some attractive ballet gloves to choose Several fantastic ballet stockings to choose Plentiful ballet shoes of different styles to choose Vivid backgrounds with different music to choose Take a photo with the beautiful ballerina together Share the perfect ballerina via Facebook or E-mail with just one click Screenshots of the ballerina can be saved in your photo album Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions Need You Know: This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.
