description: ★★★ #1 Best Adventure Game in 66 countries! ★★ #1 Best Game in 3 countries! ★ Top 10 Best Apps in 21 countries! 3D Maze is a free adventure & puzzle game that brings the classic labyrinth into a whole new 3D level! Explore and find a way out of 12 amazing labyrinths. It's a little bit scary - there are no maps! Climb to the top of tower, castle or pyramid and look down to see the exit point. Check how fast you can reach the end. At the last labyrinth you have to run fast as hell! You have only 10 minutes before volcano blows! When you pass the finish line, run to the boat area and escape from the island! 5 new modern mazes arrived! If you want some extra fun in colorful levels check it now! Start exploration from Blue level through beautifully designed Gold and Glass and end it on Science level or Cosmo if you good enough! It also means that more achievements and leaderboards are available! 3D Maze is celebrating first birthday. That's why there is one new sweet level! Why it's sweet? Because it's full of gifts and cake! Feel like a king in your birthday hat while standing and watching labyrinth from the top. You passed all levels? If you didn't see you have one additional great level. If you are fan of games like Minecraft or retro-blocky style you will definitely like this one - new Mazecraft level! Start the exploration and check out new funcionality dedicated only for this level - movable cubes! Now you can move boxes and demolish cube house. Maybe if you patient enough you can craft something? :) How to play: ● swipe up, left, right or down to move ● jump or go to the top of tower to see the end of the labyrinth Features: ● Leaderboards Login to Google+ by clicking on High Scores and challenge the people around the world! If you had previous version of 3D Maze your scores will be automatically updated to Leaderboards. ● Enjoy excellent HD graphics ● Cool music and sounds 3D Maze game is also suitable for kids. They will love funny bird-looking character! Just play and have fun! If you like retro-pixel games, check another version -> 3D Maze Retro in my apps. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB (Minecraft creators). -------------------------------------- Are you fan of 3D Maze? Like us on facebook or follow us on Twitter: https://www.facebook.com/3Dmaze https://twitter.com/MobaduApps

Save and manage workplaces and shifts very easily! Save as much as workplaces and shifts you want! It is unlimited! Display up to 5 shifts each day! Saved shifts are displayed in timeline below the calendar! Drag and move in all direction! You can also save breaktime, day wage and set an alarm for each shift! ＊ShiftLog Ladys do not sync with Google Calendar. When the mobile is manner mode, the alarm may not work properly by the model. ShiftLog Ladys Howto Guide ＜Menu Buttons of the mobile＞ 1. Calendar Mail:Send your shift by email with the image. 2. Alarm: Set sound and volume. 3. Setting:Select a background color and set basic functions of the app. 4. Backup: Save the data to SD card. 5. Password: Set the password. 6. More: ---Copy to SD card: Copy the data to internal and external SD card. ---Recovery: Use this function when you want to return to the previous data. ＊Please note that the current data will be deleted when you use this function. ＜Background Color＞ １．Let's select background color first! Press "Menu" button of the mobile and select "Setting". ２．Select "Color" from "Setting". ３．Pattern１:Pastel blue, pattern２:Pink. Select the color you like! Let's create shifts! １．Tap "Edit" button (Pensil) of the calendar. ２．Move to "Shift List". ３．Tap ＋button to create a new shift. ４．Move to "Add Shift" window. ５．Tap ＋button to create a new workplace. ６．Move to the pop-up. ＊Buttons of the pop-up(Creation window of workplace)＊ a）「Save」button. b）「Back」button. Go back to "Add Shift". c）「Delete」button. After saving the name, use this button to delete the workplace. d）「Name」: Enter the name of the workplace. ７．Save with Save button and go back to Add Shift. ＊Add Shift Window＊ 「Shift」：Enter shift name. 「Time」：Set working hours. 「Break Time」：Set the breaktime. 「Text Color」：Select a text color. Default is white. 「BackColor」：Select a background color. You can check the color with the preview.「Alarm」：Set an alarm. 「Sum Amount」：Day wage sum. This is for a person who works by hourly wage. 「Memo」：Save a memo. ８．Save with "Save" button. ＊Create a new shift for the same workplace.＊ ９．Tap ＋button in Shift List window. １０．Move to Add Shift window. When you create a shift for the same workplace, confirm the workplace name is selected (red color). Enter shift name and so on. １１．Create more shifts in the same way. ＜After saving shifts＞ １．You can confirm all the shifts you created in the Shift Lift window. ２．Tap "Edit" button (Pensil) to edit each shift. ３．Tap one of the shift and move to the calendar. ４．You can see the selected shift in the balloon. Tap the date you want to add this shift. You can add and delete the shift just by tapping the day! ５．Delete the shift by tapping twice! It is so easy! ６．Release the selection with "Close" button. Tap "Edit" button of the calendar to select another shift. １．Select a day → Tap one of the shift below the calendar! ２．Move to Shift Edit window. ３．Check here working・absence・paid leave・compensatory leave. ４．Change working hours if it is necessary. ５．Add and Edit memo. ＜Calendar's button＞ １．「Workplace」：See the list of workplaces. Select one to display the calendar. ２．「Shift」：See the list of shifts. Select one to display the calendar. ３．「Weekly display」：Switch the display from monthly to weekly. １．「Edit」：Create a new shift. ２．「Note」：Create a short memo. ３．「Today」：Go back to today's date. ４．「Left and Right」：Move dates right and left. ５．「 List」：Switch the display from the calendar to the list.

description: Is your friend talking out of their butt? Inform them (and the rest of your party) that you're not buying it. Save a shortcut to this meter on your home screen to quickly open the application. As with all Diss 'n' Gauges meters, this meter reacts to tapping on the screen. Tap once to trigger, tap a second time to reset. Diss 'n' Gauges: BS Detector provides one-click access to the meter. This small, lightweight app is great for users that want to quickly access the meter during conversations. It's also less expensive than the Diss 'n' Gauges: Multi-Pack. Are you looking for best and funniest way to start or end (disengage from) a conversation? Each laugh you get is worth the cost of this application. Engage and disengage (or diss 'n' gauge) in conversations now. --- If you love this meter, try the Diss 'n' Gauges: Multi-Pack, which combines all our individual meters into one great application. The Multi-Pack includes: 1. BS Detector: Is your friend talking out of their butt? Inform them (and the rest of your party) that you're not buying it. 2. Dial It Down: Is your friend acting nasty or spiteful and it's exceeding your tolerance level? Inform them (and the rest of your party) that they need to dial it back a bit. 3. Crap-o-Meter: Is your friend droning on and on about something that you couldn't care less about (say, Crossfit, for instance)? Inform them (and the rest of your party) of your disinterest in a fun way. 4. Hottie Finder: Looking for a great way to strike up a conversation with that beautiful girl or guy across the bar? Let our Hottie Finder act as a divining rod to direct you to them! 5. Gaydar: Having difficulty identifying gay girls or guys in the clubs and karaoke halls? Let our Gaydar Detector help locate them! 6. Fuel Gauge: Need some help deciding if you need one more or had one too many? Here's a quick, clever way to reply to friends when they ask if you're ready for another round. Buy the Diss 'n' Gauges: Multi-Pack and we'll upgrade you to receive all new meters as they come out, absolutely free!

Dinosaur reveal and discover for kids is a great game for toddlers. It contains fun, colorful illustrations of dinosaurs. This is a fun, entertaining and educational scratch game where a surface of some kind is scratch off to reveal a secret picture. The surface that can be scratched off have many different effects, as blur, twist, inverted colors, single color and much more. Scratch games let your kid learn about colors, shapes, practice motor skills and hand-eye coordination. It also introduces cause and effect relationships. Features - Many fantastic levels - Multiple effects to scrape off - No third-party advertisement - practice hand-eye coordination - Suitable for toddlers from age 2 and up For more fun games for kids, have a look at our other games for kids.

description: Talk to Luis the talking lion. He answers with his funny voice and reacts to what you say or your touch. With 8 exciting inside games with many levels to play! Luis is a huge friendly lion with a slight personality disorder that makes him act a little bit weird some time. Spend some time with him and become his friend. Get to know him better and he will show you that even if he is the king of the jungle there are some animals that could become slightly dangerous for him. Warning: There are flying Elephants that did not learn how to land properly. ★★★ Features: ★★★ ✔ High quality 3D graphics ✔ Voice interaction/animations ✔ Lion and Elephant/ Rhino Animations ✔ Exciting touch game with 20 levels inside - for free ✔ Great numbers game - check now the IQ and your brains memory ✔ 1to60 game incl. 1 to 60, A to Z, 2 4 6…, 1 3 5 …, hex, roman numerals, periodic table, octal, etc. ✔ Funny casual game. Catch the lion at the house game, with different animals that will try to deceive you. Check your high score! ✔ Special effects: whistle, wait hiccup, shake, kiss, hello, gets bald etc. ✔ Special Sound Effects ✔ Piano Extra Content: ★ Comics & Cartoons: We have comics involving different subjects as for example: holidays, tv, dogs, fish, bears and many many more. ★ Jokes Collection: Funny jokes divided in different categories. You will find funny jokes about: weather, jobs, nurses, teachers, military, etc. ★ General knowledge: Do you know all the things about history, machines, geology, biology, environment, economy, people, science etc.? ★ Photo Fun Functionality: Create funny and fake images/pictures and send per mail, share pictures with Whatsapp, Twitter, Skype, another Messenger Tool or upload them to Facebook, Flickr, Dropbox etc. Upload your pics and turn yourself or your friend into a penguin, a dancing smiley, an alien, a sweet baby, a donkey, a giraffe, a squirrel, etc. ★ Great and wonderful images out of the space. You will see the space shuttle, the moon, burning rockets, turning satellites, astronauts on a spacewalk, the first men doing a moonwalk, and many more... ★ Online shop with toys, electronic gadgets, stylish fashion, etc. ★ Video Trailers: Video section with different trailers of hot apps. ★ Stickers Give your pictures a personal touch. Select either a photo from your gallery or an image which is already faked. Take the selected pic and start personalizing by choosing between numerous stickers. You will be spoiled for choice in selecting the coolest sticker. It contains stickers with various subjects like, hats, wigs (hairstyles), skulls, sunglasses, mouth expressions like kisses, scary objects with blood, etc. Let your pictures communicate something or create some comics by writing some fun stuff into bubbles. ★ Kids paint: Super entertaining tool to try and draw a picture with your fingertip. There are also a lot of predefined cartoon pictures that can be colored such as a mighty tiger, birds, a jumping Kangaroo, horses, an acrobatic monkey, a huge elephant, cars, helicopter, ships, fast rockets and many more. Discover the artist in you! ★ Pairs: Find the same looking images on the board and train your memory with this cool match-2 game. ★ Sliding puzzle: Touch and slide the pieces of the puzzle where they belong to recreate the original image. ★ Pair Up: Match up the pictures that belong together (that have something in common). ★ Two Players Super Duel: Challenge your friends and discover who has got the faster reflexes. ★ Quiz: Put your general knowledge to test. Enjoy hours of fun and laughter with this funny app! It is especially fun for children and adults of all ages.

============================================================== === Please Note, === This App may not run correctly on some Dual Sim Phones! === Android 5.0 Lollipop does not permitted to change mobile data state! Sorry === After updating: If you have problems, delete the program and reinstall it. ============================================================== Mobile Data Scheduler - Battery Saver. Protect your health (Less radiation of microwaves, SAR values) Mobile data scheduler does not overload your system. You can easily schedule the ON/OFF stands of your mobile internet via your mobile data scheduler. Some examples for possible usage of application; 1.An example setting for regular daily users: - Internet is always off (5.section) time period 00:00 06:59 - You can select ‘ Internet on time : 1 min., Internet off time :19 min.’, as timer (1.section). (In this setting, the timer will be active only between 07.00 and 23.59) 2. An example of a setting for ‘out of office hours users’: - Internet is always on (4.section). Time period 18:00 & 01:00 - Internet is always off (5.section). Time period 01:01 and 06:59 - You can select ‘ Internet on time : 1 min., Internet off time :19 min.’, as timer (1.section). (In this setting, the timer will be active only between 07.00 and 17.59) 3. An example of a setting for the users who mainly make use of the programme during daytime: - Internet is always on (4.section) time period 07:00 & 18:00 - Internet is always off (5.section) time period 00:00 & 06:59 - You can select ‘ Internet on time : 1 min., Internet off time :19 min.’, as timer (1.section). (In this setting, the timer will be active only between 18.00 and 23.59) Question: What does ∑1-∑2-∑3 mean? Answer: ∑1-∑2-∑3 specifies the ranking of the rules‘ validity. The most valid rule is ∑1. (∑1 -> ∑2 -> ∑3) 1.Example: Internet is always on (4.section -∑1 ) Let’s assume that the time period is determined as 07:00 & 18:00. In this time period the other functions which are ∑2 ve ∑3 (the rules in 1-2-3-6), will not function. 2.Example: Internet is always off (5.section - ∑1) If we assume that the time period is determined as 01.00 & 07:00; then the internet will not be working in any of the sections during this time period. Question: What does ‘Delay (seconds) (3.section)’ mean? Answer: ‘Delay’ is used to switch off the internet after the screen is turned off. It gives the user the opportunity to switch off the internet either right after turning off the screen or after a certain amount of time. If this program does not work in your mobile phone or if you have any further requests with regards to the program, you can easily reach out to me via goksukasim@gmail.com Before you leave any negative comments, I appreciate that you inform me about the mistakes. So I have a chance to correct :) I am hoping to see your votes and comments via Google Play. Thank you

description: Altra Stampa è una rassegna stampa alternativa che aggrega notizie provenienti da fonti "non ufficiali" di informazione libera. Per scoprire quello che governo, quotidiani e telegiornali italiani non dicono sulla politica, economia, finanza, banche, attualità, Eurolandia, crisi economica ecc. Altra Stampa è apolitica, indipendente e libera e non ha relazioni con nessun editore o partito. Altra Stampa aggrega le notizie da questi siti attivi sia su internet che sui vari social network come Facebook e Twitter: * Globalist * ControPiano * Informare X Resistere * Linkiesta * Fanpage * NoCensura * CoscienzeInRete * Mente Critica * Diritto di Critica * Ecco Cosa Vedo * StampaLibera * Fronte di Liberazione dai Banchieri * Come Don Chisciotte L'applicazione è al momento una BETA. Se avete critiche, suggerimenti, richieste di miglioramenti o di inclusione di altri siti o pagine Facebook, per favore non aggiungete commenti negativi ma mandate una email all'indirizzo pinenutsdev@gmail.com in modo che possiamo intervenire. L'applicazione Altra Stampa non è affiliata nè ha alcun tipo di relazione con i menzionati siti. Inoltre, fungendo soltanto da veicolo di visualizzazione di notizie già presenti pubblicamente via internet, non è da ritenersi responsabile in alcun modo per e riguardo le notizie mostrate. Other Press is a press release that aggregates news from alternative sources "unofficial" free information. To find out what the government, newspapers and newscasts Italians do not say about politics, economics, finance, banking, currency, Euroland, economic crisis, etc.. Another print is apolitical, independent and free and has no relations with any publisher or party. Another Print aggregates news from these sites on the internet that is active on various social networking sites such as Facebook and Twitter: * Globalist * Contropiano * Inform X Resist * Linkiesta * Fanpage * NoCensura * CoscienzeInRete * Critical Mind * Right of Criticism * Here's what I see * StampaLibera * Liberation Front by the Bankers * How Don Quixote The application is currently a BETA. If you have any criticisms, suggestions, requests for enhancements or inclusion of other sites or Facebook pages, please do not add negative comments but please send an email to pinenutsdev@gmail.com so that we can intervene. The application Other Printing is not affiliated nor have any kind of relationship with the mentioned sites. In addition, acting only as a vehicle for displaying information already publicly via the Internet can not be held responsible in any way for, and news about the show.

Deze digitale natuurgids Tuinvogels van Nederland maakt deel uit van een serie mobiele informatiesystemen voor het herkennen van soorten in de natuur. Ze zijn ontwikkeld in het kader van het EU KeyToNature project dat beoogt flora- en fauna-informatie snel en makkelijk toegankelijk te maken. Deze e-guide bevat: - Informatie over bijna 100 soorten vogels die in steden en dorpen worden gezien - Ruim 350 foto's en tekeningen - De geluiden van vrijwel alle soorten - Een determinatiesleutel voor het identificeren van soorten - Een alfabetische soortenlijst met een zoekfunctie E-guides voor orchideeën, vlinders, roofvogels, vissen, reptielen en amfibieën zijn reeds beschikbaar; andere titels zijn in voorbereiding. Deze titel is een aangepaste heruitgave van de CD-ROM Vogels van Europa (ISBN 90-215-3009-0), gepubliceerd door ETI. Behalve Tuinvogels van Nederland is er een e-flora en een serie e-fauna's (vogels van Europa, vlinders, reptielen en amfibieën en zoetwatervissen). Andere titels zijn in voorbereiding. Colofon: Samenstelling: Tekla Boersma, Huub Veldhuijzen van Zanten en Paul Klinkenberg Programmering: Dennis Seijts, Stefano Martellos en Edwin van Spronsen Initiatief: ETI BioInformatics Identificatiesleutel: Ronald Sluys, Gideon Gijswijt en Huub Veldhuijzen van Zanten Tekeningen: F.J. Maas, Joh. Reydon en P. van der Wolf Geluiden: C. Hazevoet en L. Svensson Foto's: De volgende natuurfotografen zijn wij zeer erkentelijk voor hun bereidwillige medewerking: Han Bouwmeester (www.hanbouwmeester.nl), Jankees Schwiebbe (www.birdphoto.nl), Pieter Dol (www.pieterdol.com), Richard Diepstraten (www.pbase.com/richard2051), Toy Jansen (www.globalbirding.com), Edwin van Spronsen en Stichting Saxifraga (Piet Munsterman, Luc Hoogenstein en Jan C. van der Straaten). ETI BioInformatics is in 1990 opgericht door de Nederlandse overheid en UNESCO om brede toegang tot informatie op het gebied van de taxonomie en biodiversiteit te faciliteren. Zie www.eti.uva.nl This digital naturalist Garden Birds Netherlands is part of a series of mobile systems for identifying species in nature. They are developed in the framework of the EU project that aims KeyToNature flora and fauna information quickly and easily accessible. This app includes: - Information on nearly 100 species of birds that are seen in towns and villages - More than 350 photos and drawings - The sounds of almost all kinds - An identification key for the identification of species - An alphabetical list of species with a search function E-Guides for orchids, butterflies, birds of prey, fish, reptiles and amphibians are already available, other titles are in preparation. This title is a modified version of the CD-ROM Birds of Europe (ISBN 90-215-3009-0), published by ETI. Except Garden Birds Netherlands is an e-flora and a series of e-faunas (birds of Europe, butterflies, reptiles and amphibians and freshwater fish). Other titles are in preparation. Imprint: Composition: Tekla Boersma, Veldhuijzen Huub van Zanten and Paul Klinkenberg Programming: Dennis Seijts, Stefano Martellos and Edwin van Spronsen Initiative: ETI BioInformatics Identification Key: Ronald Sluys, and Gideon Gijswijt Veldhuijzen Huub van Zanten Drawings: FJ Maas, John. Reydon and P. van der Wolf Sounds: C. Hazevoet and L. Svensson Photos: The following photographers we are very grateful for their generous support: Han Bouwmeester (www.hanbouwmeester.nl), Jankees Schwiebbe (www.birdphoto.nl), Pieter Dol (www.pieterdol.com), Richard Diepstraten (www.pbase .com/richard2051), Toy Jansen (www.globalbirding.com), Edwin van Spronsen and Saxifraga Foundation (Piet Munsterman, Luc Hoogenstein and Jan C. van der Straaten). ETI BioInformatics was founded in 1990 by the Dutch government and UNESCO to facilitate. Broad access to information in the field of taxonomy and biodiversity See www.eti.uva.nl

description: 200만 명이 선택한 홈웨이트트레이닝이 더 세련된 디자인과 UI의 패션근육만들기로 업데이트 되었습니다. 홈웨이트트레이닝, 패션근육만들기는 불필요한 운동은 제거하고 꼭 필요한 운동만 소개하여 부담을 줄이고 높은 효과를 얻을 수 있도록 구성되었습니다. 많은 이용 바랍니다. -------------------------- ✔ 무료어플 전체 2위 (7월 14일 부터 약 2주간) ✔ 건강 및 피트니스 카테고리 1위 (7월 13일 부터 약 3주간) ✔ 스마트한 앱 포털 팟게이트 신규무료 1위 (11.7.13) ✔ 스마트한 앱 포털 팟게이트 무료 부분 전체카테고리 2위(11.7.13) ✔ 머니투데이 오늘의 앱에 선정(11.7.18)외 언론보도 10곳 적당히 보기 좋은 근육질의 몸, 알고 보면 집에서도 충분히 만들 수 있습니다. 이제 아까운 시간과 돈 써가며 헬스장 가지 마시고 집에서 홈웨이트트레이닝으로 자신 있는 몸 만드세요. 딱 주 4일, 하루 15~20분 투자면 당신도 해변에서 자신 있게 웃통을 벗을 수 있습니다. 물론 운동시간을 더 늘리시면 더 빠른 근육증강이 가능합니다. 어플 속 모델은 개발자 본인이며, 평균 주 5일 하루 15분 단위로 하루 두 부위씩 약 한달 간 운동한 상태입니다. 특이 이런 분들께 홈웨이트트레이닝을 추천해드립니다. - 일이 끝나고 나면 너무 피곤해서 헬스장 가기가 너무 힘드신 분들 - 매 여름마다 헬스장만 등록하면 몇 일만 가다가 안 가셔서 돈을 낭비하시는 분들 - 헬스장갈 돈이 없는 용돈쟁이 학생들 - 헬즈장 등록과 보충제까지 먹자니 자금 부담이 크신 분들(보충제만 사고 운동은 집에서!) - 인터넷에서 쉽게 구매 가능한 조립형 덤벨 (약 2~3만 원) - 의자 - 주변의 학교나 공원에 있는 철봉이나 평행봉 1. 가슴 -내로우스탠스푸쉬업 -와이드스텐스푸쉬업 -밀리터리푸쉬업 -디클라인푸쉬업 -플로어덤벨벤치프레스 2. 다리 -스쿼트 -덤벨런지 3. 등 -Y레이즈 -풀업 -벤트오버덤벨로우 4. 어깨 -리어 레터럴 레이즈 -아놀드프레스 -프론트레이즈 -사이드레터럴레이즈 -아놀드프레스 5. 복근 -크런치 -리버스크런치 -사이드크런치 -바이시클 크런치 6. 팔 - 덤벨오버헤드 트라이셉스 익스텐션 - 벤치딥스 -바벨컬 -바벨리버스컬 -리스트컬 -레버리지 바 엑서사이즈 200 million people have chosen a more sophisticated home weight training in fashion design and the UI has been updated to make muscle. Teil 1: Phantasiereise in Anlehnung an das Autogene Training – Traumhafte Insel (20:48 min) Teil 2: Natur-Sounds zum Entspannen und als Einschlafhilfe für einen erholsamen Schlaf (Timerfunktion: 1 min - unendlich) Zu Teil 1 - Fantasiereise: Eine geführte Fantasiereise auf eine wunderschöne Südseeinsel in Anlehnung an das Autogene Training mit Entspannungsmusik und dem sanften Rauschen des Meeres zur Tiefenentspannung und für einen tiefen und erholsamen Schlaf. Lass dich mitnehmen an diesen wunderschönen Ort und sinke in einen tiefen und erholsamen Schlaf. Diese Phantasiereise hat mittlerweile bei Youtube über 1 Millionen Aufrufe und hilft vielen Menschen schon nach kurzer Zeit in den Schlaf zu sinken. Du hast die Möglichkeit, dir die vollständige Reise, wie sie hier in dieser App angeboten wird unter Youtube anzuhören und kannst auf diese Weise ihre Wirksamkeit bei dir testen. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MNS0XyYeFEA Diese Reise ist die Kurzvariante der langen Album-Version „Autogenes Training – Phantasiereise – tiefe Entspannung & erholsamer Schlaf“, (35.10 Minuten), die bei den wichtigsten Musicstores, wie amazon, iTunes... zum Download erhältlich ist. Bei der langen Version ist der Schlusstextteil länger ausgedehnt - mit etwas längeren Pausen - und die Musik läuft noch insgesamt 17 Minuten, wird langsam ausgeblendet und verschwindet langsam im sanften Rauschen des Meeres, so dass man am Ende noch 3:15 reines entspannendes Meeresrauschen hört, dass dich sanft in den Schlaf wiegt, falls du bis dahin noch nicht eingeschlafen bist. Die Musik „Blissful Sleep“ (40 Minuten) ist auf dem Album „Music for Autogenic Training, Hypnosis, Relaxation, Meditation & Sleep“ ebenfalls in den verschiedenen Musicstores zum Download erhältlich. "Blissful Sleep (Short Version)" (9.36 Minuten) ist Stück 7 auf dem Album Yoga Sunset Chill Vol. V. Zu Teil 2 - Natur-Sounds: Eine Auswahl von 4 qualitativ hochwertig aufgenommenen Natur-Sounds zum Einschlafen: Sommergewitter, Feuer, Meeresrauschen, fließender Bach. Mit einer Timer-Funktion kann man die Laufzeit der jeweiligen Sounds einstellen, so dass nach Ablauf der eingestellten Zeit die Sounds selbständig gestoppt werden. Die App bietet den Vorteil, dass man sie im Flugmodus - also ohne Internetverbindung - des Handys bedienen kann, es sei denn man möchte die angegebenen Links bedienen. Dies erfordert dann natürlich eine Internetverbindung. Part 1: Flights of fancy based on autogenic training - Dreamlike Island (20:48 minutes) Part 2: nature sounds to relax and fall asleep to a restful sleep (timer: 1 min - infinity) To Part 1 - Fantasy Journey: A guided fantasy trip to a beautiful South Seas island on the basis of autogenic training with relaxing music and the gentle sounds of the ocean for deep relaxation and a deep and restful sleep. Let's take you to this wonderful place and falling into a deep and restful sleep. This fantasy has now travel to decline over 1 million views on Youtube and helps many people in a short time to sleep. You have the opportunity to listen to you the whole trip, as it is offered here in this app in youtube and can test their effectiveness in this way with you. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MNS0XyYeFEA This trip is the short version of the long album version of "Autogenic training - Flights of fancy - deep relaxation and restful sleep" (35.10 minutes) ... at the most important music stores such as Amazon, iTunes is available for download. In the long version of the final text part is longer extended - with some longer breaks - and the music is still a total of 17 minutes will slowly fade and disappear slowly in the gentle sounds of the ocean, so you hear pure relaxing sound of the sea at the end yet 3:15 that you gently lulls you to sleep if you're not asleep by then. The music "Blissful Sleep" (40 minutes) is available for download on the album "Music for Autogenic Training, Hypnosis, Relaxation, Meditation & Sleep" also in the various music stores. "Blissful Sleep (Short Version)" (9:36 minutes) piece is 7 on the album Yoga Sunset Chill Vol V. To Part 2 - Nature Sounds: A selection of 4 high quality recorded nature sounds to fall asleep: Summer storms, fire, ocean waves, flowing stream. With a timer you can set the duration of the sound itself so that after the set time, the sounds are stopped automatically. The app offers the advantage that they are in flight mode - can use the phone, unless you want to use the links provided - without internet connection. This of course then requires an Internet connection.

••• #1 Battery Utility app for you Android ••• Battery Saver is the best utility app for your device and a must have! It is a well designed utility app which makes you understand more about your device’s battery and the regular usage of the app along with the following tips and suggestions which would help in extending your battery life. Read on to know more about the key features - ▶Battery Usage◀ — Get estimated time left for plethora of services on your device including Talk Time, Internet On Wi-Fi, Internet On 3G, Video Playback, Audio Playback, Audio (Bluetooth), Standby and Airplane Mode Time. ►Modes◀ —To enhance battery life you can select any mode.It will smartly use your Wi-Fi, Mobile Data and Bluetooth. When battery reaches threshold value it will apply optimize settings to maximize your battery life. ►Hardware Usage◀ —With colourful representation on Pie Chart,Hardware Usage has been made a lot more simpler to understand for not so techie users. You can also control your bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Mobile Data, brightness from the app. ►Battery Details◀ —With additional battery details, you can get battery temp , battery voltage and thus you can protect your battery from overheating. ►Power Usage◀ —Now you can easily mark out the battery draining apps and clicking on them you can force close them. ►Functions◀ The app has some of the best and the most useful suggestions to extend battery life. Tell how long the battery will last under your current situation. It also helps to recognize background running apps. ►Charging Details◀ — The app estimates the time left to charge your device battery to 100%. It also recognizes the unique 3 state charging system of your device and thus remind you not to overcharge . ——— More features coming soon! For any suggestions/feedbacks, you can contact us at support@phonato.com

description: Time It! - Personal Time Tracker Time It! allows you to easily track time spent for any kind of activity: work, sport, travel, entertainment... Everything is possible by pushing one single button. You get a clear overview of your daily activity and time spent for each of them. Reduce your stress, increase your efficiency! This application suits perfectly people managing several contracts or projects daily, working hourly, recording sportive or artistic performances, or simply willing to keep track of their various activities (travel, visits, lectures, development ...). With its two modes (streaming or daily report) and the possibility to export into CSV (OpenOffice, Excel, Calc, Google Docs compatible), Time It! allows the user to create advanced statistic sharts. Features : - Time tracking - Import / Export into CSV - Send to DropBox - Data sharing (email, Drive...) - Add comments for your activities - Start back from a previous track - Daily, weekly, monthly report - Widgets (maximal, normal or minimal size) Permissions : - READ/WRITE EXTERNAL STORAGE : read / write data on local support (import/export CSV, only in the dedicated folder). - INTERNET : save into you Dropbox account (only with your permission and into dedicated folder). Feedback : This is the first version. Don't hesitate to provide us feedback or bug reports by using our email contact@manbolo.com (now it is impossible for us to reply to comments on Google Play). This application is simple and user friendly, and seeks only to evolve. Donations If you like our application, please support us by donating or by buying our game Meon. Thanks!

description: Paramedic Review Plus™ provides the ultimate exam preparation experience for the Paramedic student. Paramedic Review Plus™ contains a total of four realistic 100-question simulated NREMT exams plus nine, 25-question topic review quizzes on all of the main paramedic modules. **New to version 2.0 are additional questions PLUS TWO BONUS SECTIONS requested by our users: ECG Interpretation (15 challenging practice strips) and Medication Calculations (25 multiple choice questions). Excellent for preparing for classroom exams or your certification examination, Paramedic Review Plus™ provides high quality, application-based questions that closely resemble the style found on state and national certification exams. Experienced Paramedics may also choose to use Paramedic Review Plus™ to test their knowledge or to prepare for recertification or relicensure. Paramedic Review Plus™ questions are based on the new EMS Education Standards and 2010 American Heart Association ECC Guidelines. Paramedic Review Plus™ is designed to provide several learning options. You may take an entire practice exam at once or choose one of the nine 25-question topical review sections for targeted review. You receive instant feedback on each question with a rationale answer designed to increase your knowledge and understanding. Use the 25-question quizzes to prepare for classroom exams or for diagnostic feedback on areas for further study at the end of your class. Use the "Mastered" button to remove questions from the program so you will only focus on the material you need to study. Scores can be emailed directly from the application to share with instructors or study groups. Paramedic Review Plus™ was founded by EMS textbook author and educator Dan Limmer. Limmer and a group of highly experienced national EMS educators created a product that not only tests your knowledge in key Paramedic course topics but also helps you to prepare for your national or state examination. Questions included in Paramedic Review Plus™ are application-based, “best answer” questions that test your understanding—not just your recall—and allow you to experience questions of the same type you will see on the exam. Don’t take a chance. Pass the Test with Paramedic Review™. NOTE: Purchase of this app will not provide the user access to the lc-ready.com web site

description: Media Player for Android features: Automatic detection of media on the SD card Unified start screen to access audio or video files and playing internet radio or e-radio Intuitive playlist creation and editing Intelligent play button Audio meta data (artist, album, year) information Easy Insert mode for adding songs to a playlist Advanced play controls like 'swipe to seek' Ability to set Shuffle, Repeat, Loop, Mute Volume features Ability to quit the application so that you don't waste your system resources Live streaming support for capturing internet radio or music streaming Exit option from audio, video or internet radio interfaces Full screen video support Special Feature Listen to music and record a video at the same time. This app does not record video. You just play the music with it and record video with some video recorder app. Please rank the application if you like it. Thank you... NB: This application shows ads when you are connected to the Internet. Those are Google AdMob ads, which are supposed to be safe. This is a free app and there are ads to ensure long term support. Also we may supply at most 2 notification ads per day.

The easiest to use navigation system arround. Enter (or speak) your destination, press "Start Navigation" and your on your way. Spoken and tekst route description in Korean and 40+ languages - Most user friendly navigation system. - Multi language: Spoken and text directions in 40+ languages. - Speech destination entry. - Automatic route recalculation. - Zoom dependent on speed. - Online, always most accurate routes/maps.

This application may be helpful for New Zealand contractors to figure out their Net income from Hourly Rate or Hourly Rate from desired “Take Home”. (*Net income is a number also known as “Take Home” or Salary/Wage after taxes). All breakdown elements will be calculated automatically once one of editable fields is changed. It is possible to adjust quantity of workdays in year, work hours, tax levels and ACC in settings. This application also may be useful for immigrants from countries, such as Russia, where all family budget calculations based on monthly Net income (salary after taxes). Please notice that daily value is a calculation for every of 365 days and work dayliy is a calculation for every day excluding all holidays and 20 days leave (usually 229 days). So, daily - is for every day of year, and workdaily for every day spent at work.
release_text: *Now full annual, monthly, fortnightly, weekly, daily and hourly breakdown available if you clkick on "more" button. *Now it is possible to configure tax and acc

description: RFO BASIC! is a dialect of Dartmouth Basic that allows you to write and run programs directly on your Android device. There is a 200+ page manual available in pdf and docx format. In addition to the traditional Basic features, your have access to: Graphics (with Multi-touch), Build User Interfaces with HTML and JavaScript, SQL, GPS, Device Sensors, Music Play, Text to Speech, Voice Recognition, Sound Pools, Audio Recording, Tone Generation, Camera, Data Structures such as:Array/List/Stack/Bundle Internet Browsing, Text and Byte file I/O, Encryption, User defined functions, FTP Client, TCP/IP Client and Server Sockets, Bluetooth, Send and Receive SMS Messages, Send Emails, Make a phone call, Superuser access BASIC! programs may be packaged into applications. There are two processes provided for this. One process generates a home screen shortcut but requires BASIC! installed to run. The other process generates a stand alone application that does not need BASIC! installed. The resulting application can be offered on the Android Market. All of the features of BASIC! are documented in the manual, De Re BASIC!. The install package includes over three dozen BASIC! source code files that explain and demonstrate the implementation details of this dialect. BASIC! is being continuously improved. Many of the improvements have come from user requests. Also, since BASIC! is open source, others have begun on the code. Join the BASIC! forum and become part of the development team. Permissions: This application asks for many permissions. None of permissions are exercised by BASIC! on its own. They are only exercised if you, the BASIC! programmer, writes a program that exercises them. For example, BASIC! will never intercept a SMS message unless you use the SMS commands in a program that you write.
release_text: Here's a gift to start the new year: an upgrade to BASIC! - A couple of crashes and lesser bugs fixed. - A few new commands. - Enhancements to Graphics. - Improvements in file I/O. For full details of features and bugfixes see the Release Notes and download the User's Guide at: https://bintray.com/rfo-basic/android/RFO-BASIC/ Join us in the BASIC! Forum at: http://rfobasic.freeforums.org

description: The free SwitzerlandMobility app is the perfect app for anybody who is out and about in Switzerland: - maps of Switzerland from swisstopo up to a scale of 1:25,000 (the best) - 32,000 km signposted non-motorized routes (national, regional and local) - complete network of signposted hiking trails (60,000 km) - 25,000 public transportation stops linked to the timetable of the Swiss Federal Railways (planning a tour with public transportation was never easier) - information on 4,500 points of interest on the way, such as overnight accommodations, bicycle service stations, etc. positioning system and compass function (you always know where you are) With SwitzerlandMobility Plus you can additionally - download and store swisstopo maps to be used in areas without network coverage (no more problems with dead zones) - download and store tours you designed, including elevation profile, hiking time, distance and altitude (separately and easily) Please note: - The app requires network coverage (useable without network coverage with SwitzerlandMobility Plus). - No tours can be entered with the app. Constant use of the GPS may considerably reduce the length of battery life. Requires a screen resolution of min. 480x320 pixels (HVGA) and multitouch. Unfortunately, the Samsung GT-S6102 or GT-S5570, among others, does not fulfill this requirement.
Jeep & Off-Road Discussion Forum for every model plus Galleries, Reviews, Links, Articles, Classifieds.
release_text: -Startup crash fixed! -Fixed login bug on Android 4.2!

description: 66% OFF SALE -- TODAY: April 21-27, 2015 ★★★★★ Developed by an award-winning education studio, 22learn, the creator of the best-selling Abby Basic Skills app, in cooperation with educational specialists. ★★★★★ Get to know what it is like to be an ice cream truck driver! Drive and play with an ice cream truck; sell ice cream to the customers; make cupcakes; have fun playing one of the most addictive kid games in the app store! One of the best toddler games - Interactive 3D Amazing Ice Cream Truck Toddler Adventure game with Alex and Dora for Little Explorers by 22Learn is a flavorful, ice cream-themed app filled with activities that encourage young children’s imagination, play, and exploration one of the best toddler games. In our four truck games, children drive an ice cream truck, explore it, get a good idea how to make cupcakes and learn a way of serving ice cream to customers with a slingshot! This delicious, cool app will become every child’s favorite toy! ================================ Interactive 3D Ice Cream Truck is an educational app that will help your toddlers and preschoolers develop problem solving skills, vocabulary about truck parts, fine-motor skills and attention control. ================================ ☆ DRIVE THE ICE CREAM TRUCK: Start the engine; turn on the lights, radio listen to the ice cream truck music, drive and more! Just take a moment and imagine… being an ice cream truck driver! What a fun that is! Take a tour in your room, garden, playground, anywhere! The driving mode makes use of the built-in camera of your device to project the surrounding environment onto your windows. This makes it look as if you are actually hurrying to deliver your ice cream to hungry customers in your house! You have to experience this! ☆ LET THE ICE CREAM FLY: Did you know that scoops of ice cream fly? Well, now they can, at least in this app! Carefully observe which ice cream flavors the customer wants, then, drag the correct ice cream flavor onto the slingshot, and serve the ice cream to the customer! Being a slingplayer is fun in educational games. Be precise, so he or she can catch it. Also, pay attention: there are beings who wish to fool you; serve only to those who asked for ice cream! ☆ EXPLORE THE ICE CREAM TRUCK: Explore all the interesting things our ice cream truck has to offer! Turn on the lights, play the megaphones, pop balloons, press all the funny little buttons and more! Swipe sideways with your two fingers to change the view of the truck or tap on the arrows to do the same. ☆ MAKE CUPCAKES: Let’s have fun making cupcakes! See which cupcake the customer wants. Then, pick the right cupcake wrapper, flavor, and topping. Don’t forget to collect the coins from the customer for the finished awesome cupcake at the end! =================================== With four engaging activities in our games for kids , tons of realistic animations and sound effects, child-friendly interface, and a colorful, ice cream truck-themed design, Ice Cream Truck is going to be every child's dream come true toy. Check out the screenshots and see for yourself. You will not be disappointed. Plunge into the world of ice cream trucks, ice cream truck drivers, and ice cream-loving kids -- open doors to your imagination with this amazing app brought to you by 22learn! Download theses fun games for kids - Ice Cream Truck Games: Kids Vehicles 2 - and let the learning game educate and entertain your adorable child.

description: ** 자주묻는 질문 ** [위젯 설정 하는 법] 1. 홈 화면에서 메뉴키 -> 추가 -> 위젯을 누른다. 2. 위젯 목록에서 RememberDay_1x1, 2x1, 3x1 세가지 사이즈 중 한가지를 선택 한다. 3. 디데이 정보 입력 후 등록을 누르면 홈화면에 위젯이 생성 된다. * 위젯 배경사진 설정을 잘 활용하시면 예쁜 위젯을 만드실 수 있습니다^^ RememberDay는 살면서 특별한 날, 기억하고싶은 날 기억해야하는 날 등을 간편하게 관리할 수 있도록 도와주는 어플입니다. 1x1, 2x1, 3x1사이즈의 위젯을 제공하며 위젯의 폰트 색상, 크기조절, 배경 색상, 배경 투명도 조절기능과 외장메모리에있는 사진을 위젯 배경으로 설정할 수 있고 사진찍기기능으로 바로 찍어서 위젯배경으로 설정할 수 있습니다. RememberDay어플의 목록 탭에서는 현재 등록되어있는 디데이들의 리스트를 관리 할 수 있습니다. 날짜 계산기 탭에서는 기준일로부터 몇일 전 후의 날짜를 쉽게 계산해볼 수 있는 기능과 두 기준일 사이의 일수를 쉽계 계산할 수 있는 기능을 제공 합니다. 홈화면에서 위젯을 삭제하여도 해당 디데이 정보는 삭제되지 않으며 해당위젯은 비활성 상태가 됩니다. 비활성되어 있는 위젯은 위젯 등록화면에서 정보를 다시 불러와 재등록 할 수 있습니다. 주의 사항 RememberDay어플은 위젯을 제공하는 어플로 내장메모리에 설치되어야 정상동작을 보장할 수 있습니다. 외장메모리에 설치하실 경우 정상동작되지 않을 수 있음으로 내장메모리에 설치해 주세요^^ 위젯의 디데이 날짜 업데이트는 안드로이드 시스템 특성상 최대 30분의 오차가 발생할 수 있습니다. 부족한점이 많지만 앞으로 꾸준히 업데이트 해 나가겠습니다. 어플을 사용하면서 불편한점, 개선해야 할 점, 버그등을 메일 또는 리플로 알려주시면 적극 검토하여 업데이트하겠습니다. RememberDay어플로 자신만의 특별한 날들을 관리해보세요. 감사합니다^^ [ 업데이트 사항 ] v 3.0.1 - 기존 사용자 업데이트 시 홈화면에 설정해놓은 위젯 사라지는 현상 수정. - 기타 보고된 마이너 버그 수정. v 3.0 - 기존 다소 투박했던 UI에서 깔끔하고 더 편하게 사용하실 수 있도록 UI 전면 수정. - 매월 반복, 매년 반복 디데이 계산 기능 추가. - 애플리케이션 잠금 기능 추가. - 알림설정 ON/OFF 기능 추가. - 위젯에 배경사진 적용시 화질 개선. - 애플리케이션 안정화. - 기타 보고된 버그 수정. v 2.5 - 광고모듈 수정 - 날짜선택 시 일부 날짜가 안나오는 버그 수정(예 : 2012-02-29) - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 2.4 - 활성 상태인 위젯도 디데이 목록에서 삭제 가능하도록 수정 v 2.3 - 일부 단말에서 폰트 고딕체로 고정되는 현상 수정 - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 2.2 - 날짜 선택 UI변경 - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 2.1 - 일부 UI 변경 - 정렬기능 추가 v 2.0 - 위젯의 텍스트 정렬 기능 추가(왼쪽, 가운데, 오른쪽 정렬) - 일부 UI 변경 - 위젯 폰트 사이즈 추가 - '기념일 보기'의 지나간 기념일 회색으로 표시 - 기타 보고된 버그 수정 v 1.3 - 단말 재부팅 시 위젯이 정상적으로 표시되지 않던 버그 수정 - '기념일 보기' 화면에 기념일 계산기 기능 추가 -500일 ~ 3500일의 자동으로 계산되는 기념일 리스트 외에 -99999 ~ 99999일 사이의 기념일을 계산할 수 있습니다. - '기념일 보기'의 기념일 리스트 표기 방법 수정 기존 D-500 ~ D+3500으로 표시되던 기념일 리스트를 500일 전 ~ 3500일 로 표시되도록 수정 - 위젯의 배경 이미지 설정 기능 변경 기존 위젯배경 이미지 설정 시 이미지가 늘어나거나 줄어드는 현상으로 이쁘지 않게 적용 되던점을 수정하여 위젯 사이즈에 맞게 배경 이미지가 이쁘게 적용 되도록 수정. v 1.2 - 아이콘 및 로딩화면 변경 - 날짜 선택 시 해상도가 낮은 단말에서 완료버튼이 보이지 않던 버그 수정 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 01051186966 ** Frequently Asked Questions ** [To set the widget]    1 On the Home screen, press Menu key -> Add -> Widgets button.    2 from the list of widgets RememberDay_1x1, 2x1, 3x1, choose one of the three kinds of size.    3 Press the D-day, and then register to enter information on the home screen widget is created.   * Widget background photo widget settings to take advantage of you can create a beautiful ^ ^ RememberDay lives - a special day to remember the day you want to remember me, and that helps you easily manage applications. 1x1, 2x1, 3x1 size widget provides a widget's font color, size adjustment, background color, background transparency of picture adjustment function and the external memory can be set to the widget background in photography functions you can just take a Widget background be. description: With GetYourGuide’s free mobile app, it’s easy to find and book thousands of things to do around the world – including tours and attraction tickets – from wherever you are! Fancy skipping the line in Paris with an Eiffel Tower ticket? How about floating down Berlin's canals in a kayak or taking a day trip to Amsterdam? We’ll help you book the perfect vacation or spare-time activity. Why travellers love us: • Choose from thousands of tours, activities, and attractions, wherever you're going • Read reviews from your fellow travellers • Book confidently with a hassle-free best price guarantee • Rest assured with our safe, secure payment system Designed and optimized for frequent and casual travellers: • Verify your booking easily using mobile vouchers • Save activities to your wishlist for later • Use GPS to find the best activities near you • Search by city, category, or activity Whether you want to explore Rome on a Segway or discover Barcelona on a hop-on hop-off bus tour, the GetYourGuide mobile app makes it easy to get the most out of your holiday.
release_text: Thanks for using the GetYourGuide app! Here is what we did to improve your experience: - Faster and simpler bookings list. Your battery will thank you. - Design improvements and bug fixes We love to get your feedback! Write to apps@getyourguide.com to send us your questions or comments.

description: Never forget to un-silence your phone after a meeting, movie, church, nap, etc. . Quiet Time will turn your phone's ringer back on after a time you specify, setting it quickly using sliders for time. You can optionally set your phone to vibrate to alert you of calls or notifications, and a courtesy quick vibration to alert you when your phone's volume is back on to avoid embarrassing moments. REMEMBER TO EXCLUDE FROM TASK KILLERS. PERMISSIONS: Internet for license check Email for questions, requests or bugs. keywords: ring volume, silence, quiet, , turn off silent mode, silencer,ringer restore, sound, unsilence phone, ringer, silent restore, sleep timer, timer, snooze, silent mute, auto-restore, ringer

description: Download 'Baby Lullaby Songs' and you'll have the best combination of bedtime songs to help you put your baby to sleep. You can use this sleeping music for various purposes – play the wonderful baby rhymes to provide your infant with sound sleep or listen to the soothing lullabies yourself to help you calm down and relax. This free app will provide you with beautiful music for children and ideal songs for toddlers to sleep like angels. Download this free baby app today and you'll be amazed by the effects it produces on your child's sleeping habits! It is a perfect combination of good night songs and the sounds babies like. ♪ Songs for kids on your mobile phone! ♪ Perfect sound to sleep to! ♪ Set time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! ♪ These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! ♪ 'How do I get a baby to sleep' is a question that will never pop in your mind again! ♪ These cute nursery songs are followed by beautiful backgrounds! You're rocking, walking, or nursing your baby and its eyelids droop as it begins to nod off in your arms. Its eyes close completely, but the eyelids continue to flutter and its breathing is still irregular. Just as you bend over to deposit your sleeping baby in the crib so you can creep quietly away, the infant awakens and cries. Babies need to be parented, not just put to bed. If you're tired of many sleepless nights and you've tried everything to lull you kid but in vain, here's a new solution for you. Try playing 'Baby Lullaby Songs' on your mobile phone at bedtime and watch your children slowly doze off. This soothing music will do you good as well, and you won't be experiencing any trouble sleeping peacefully again. Your little boys and girls will adore these beautiful relaxing sounds. Newborns don't know the difference between day and night yet — and their tiny stomachs don't hold enough breast milk or formula to keep them satisfied for very long. They need food every few hours, no matter what time of day or night it is. If you want your child to have a steady sleep, then these “nursery songs” are a must for your Android™ phone. Download this super cool music app and get the collection of lullaby songs for free! Beautiful relaxation music will make both you and your little one very happy. Therefore, don't hesitate-get these amazing calming sounds now! Solve all of your worries with sleep sound app for your mobile phone! Get this set of beautiful classic lullabies and help your newborn get enough rest. These free songs are applicable to infants and toddlers of all ages. 'Baby Lullaby Songs' is a sleep music app including a variety of beautiful soothing children songs for bedtime. Combine these baby sleeping songs with some white noise or nature sounds and you'll be surprised by the effects they will produce on your kids. Get this awesome Android™ app today and solve all your parental worries! The set of excellent “baby rhymes” is waiting for you! Grab this wonderful music for infants and sleep tight together with your baby. What is more cool about these nursery lullabies is that they are totally free. We made them just for you and your kids so wait no more – download 'Baby Lullaby Songs' today! We guarantee you will love nursery songs for babies this mobile app provides! Try now and enjoy! Legal info: ===== This is a free application. Songs are originally designated to lull a child and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

Maxthon browser is the most kid-friendly browser on the market! It's a safe and clean web browser for your kids developed by the award-winning and world-leading browser company Maxthon. You have complete control of your child’s web environment. Instead of trying to infer what is appropriate for your children based on behavior or demographics Maxthon's Kid Safe browser keeps it drop dead simple: Parents set up a safe web environment by creating a safe list of websites they want to allow their kids to access. (You can use the Kid Safe browser's pre-selected list of award-winning, age appropriate sites or enter your own.) Access to any url from web domains NOT in your safe list will be blocked. That means advertisements, promotions and links to outside sites from a 'safe site' will be blocked, keeping your child's web activity safely within the boundaries you create. Same thing for search results, too. Creating and modifying of the safe-list requires a password you can reset yourself. This extra security will prevent kids from changing the safe-list. Your kids will love it. We promise!

Glenn Harrold is one of the world's most successful hypnotherapists. His CDs, MP3 downloads and Apps have sold multiple millions and he is a published author with 7 self-help books to his name including 'Sleep Well Every Night'. Insomnia and other sleep problems are often caused by stress, anxiety and a busy mind at bedtime. Glenn's highly acclaimed hypnotherapy techniques and audio production will help you overcome these problems in a completely safe and natural way. Deep Sleep hypnosis is a brand new state-of-the-art hypnotherapy recording for the APP platform that is guaranteed to put you into a deep sleep in no time and help you overcome insomnia permanently. Track one utilises Glenn's skilled hypnosis techniques to help guide you into a deep relaxing sleep every night. Track two of this title is a powerful 12 minute hypnosis sleep booster track that you can use when time is tight. Glenn has over 20 years' experience as a full-time hypnotherapist and works with many celebrity clients. He has appeared on TV a number of times and his successful hypnotherapy sessions often appear in newspaper and magazine articles. His 'Deep Sleep' hypnosis audio CD and MP3 download has sold over 100,000 and been featured on TV. This exclusive hypnosis app will help you to overcome insomnia, sleep naturally and have good quality nourishing sleep every night. Deep Sleep Includes: Track 1 - Deep Sleep Hypnotherapy Audio Track - 23:42 mins Track 2 - Sleep Booster - 12:51 mins Glenn Harrold eBook: 7 Golden Rules for Regular Healthy Sleep Introduction music written by Glenn Harrold Individual background music pieces by Glenn Harrold and Christopher Lloyd Clarke Each recording includes: * The very latest hypnotherapy techniques and state-of-the-art digital recording technology. * Glenn's calming English voice guiding you into a completely relaxed state of mind & body. * Background sound effects recorded in specific musical keys and frequencies to compliment the hypnotic suggestions and deepen the relaxation effect. * Stereo-echoed affirmations which pan from ear to ear across the stereo range - a deeply relaxing and unique effect.

Have your Fedoracoins always with you, in your pocket! You pay by quickly scanning a QR-code. As a merchant, you receive payments reliably and instantly. Fedoracoin Wallet is the first mobile Fedoracoin app, and arguably also the most secure! FEATURES: • No registration, web service or cloud needed! This wallet is de-centralized and peer to peer. • Display of Fedoracoin amount in TIPS and kTIPS. • Conversion to and from national currencies. • Sending and receiving of Fedoracoin via NFC, QR-codes or Fedoracoin URLs. • Address book for regularly used Fedoracoin addresses. • When you're offline, you can still pay via Bluetooth. • System notification for received coins. • App widget for Fedoracoin balance. You can find more about Fedoracoin at http://fedoraco.in If you want to contribute to Fedoracoin Wallet, the project is located at https://github.com/denwaotoko/fedoracoin-wallet-new This is a fork of the popular Bitcoin Wallet by Andreas Schildbach and was converted to Dogecoin by me. Find the original at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.schildbach.wallet Bugs are tracked on the github project above. If you have problems, feel free to submit or comment on bugs there! License: GPLv3 Use at your own risk! There is NO WARRANTY. http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html

Depois de instalar, você irá desfrutar de todas as novas funcionalidades que preparamos para simplificar seu dia a dia no relacionamento com o Santander: - [NOVO] Acesso simplificado usando apenas seu CPF e senha - [NOVO] Visão consolidada de Contas Correntes, Cartões, Investimentos e Empréstimos para facilitar a gestão financeira - [NOVO] Consulta de Saldo e Extrato dos últimos 60 dias e de Lançamentos futuros dos próximos 7 dias - Pagamento de Contas e Boletos com Leitor de código de barras - Transferências para Crédito em Conta, DOC e TED - Faturas de Cartões de Crédito dos últimos 12 meses e Cadastro para envio por e-mail - Pagamentos de Fatura de Cartões com possibilidade de Parcelamento - [NOVO] Faturas de Cartões de Crédito com visão gráfica - Recarga de celular, com a opção de Recarga programada - Aplicação e resgate de Poupança e CDB - Posição consolidada de Fundos de Investimentos - Contratação e cancelamento de Crédito Pessoal - [NOVO] Comprovantes por e-mail - Localização de Agências Antes de baixar, é muito importante você saber que: Este aplicativo é exclusivo para clientes do Banco Santander e está disponível apenas em Português. O Santander nunca solicita dados pessoais ou cadastrais do cliente, dados protegidos por sigilo bancário ou outras informações confidenciais por e-mail, nem a digitação de mais de uma posição do cartão de senha. Para efetuar transações financeiras é necessário habilitar o aparelho no Santander Internet Banking: 1) Após o download, efetue login no aplicativo; 2) Acesse o Santander Internet Banking e na aba Celular/Mobilidade selecione a opção Desbloqueio de Aparelho. After installing, you will enjoy all the new features we prepare to simplify their daily lives in relationship with Santander: - [NEW] Simplified access using only your Social Security number and password - [NEW] consolidated view of current accounts, cards, investments and loans to facilitate the financial management - [NEW] Balance query and extract the last 60 days and Releases future the next 7 days - Bill Payment and billets with barcode reader - Transfers for Credit Account, DOC and TED - Credit Card Bills the last 12 months and Registration for e-mail - Card Invoice Payments with the possibility of Installment - [NEW] Invoice Credit Cards graphical view - Mobile Recharge, the recharge option with scheduled - Application and rescue Savings and CBD - Consolidated position of Investment Funds - Hiring and cancellation Personal Loan - [NEW] vouchers by email - Agencies Location Before downloading, it is very important you know that: This application is exclusively for customers of Banco Santander and is available only in Portuguese. Santander never ask for personal or registration data of the client, data protected by bank secrecy or other sensitive information by email or typing in more than one position of the password card. The download applications should only be done through the official stores client operating system, never for external links or addresses. We do not recommend using the application on devices that have undergone removal of operational constraints processes (root and / or jailbreak). description: Quest'app non è ufficiale. E' uno sviluppo amatoriale pensato per accellerare i tempi di download/apertura degli orari Co.Tra.L. Nell'app sono presenti anche le informazioni dettagliate su TUTTI i biglietti ed abbonamenti Co.Tra.L. & Metrebus piu le informazioni sulle zone tariffarie con tanto di immagine esplicativa e lista con tutti i comuni del lazio con relativa zona di appartenenza. I comuni nell'app sono divisi in 3 categorie principali: -Capolinea di Roma -Capolinea nel Lazio (con ulteriore suddivisione per lettera) -Capolinea Fuori del Lazio. nel menù, accessibile dalla pagina principale e dalle 3 categorie principali, sarà possibile avere accesso al sito ufficiale della Co.Tra.L. Spa e alla pagina relativa alle zone tariffarie, ad un'About e alla funzione di uscita. Quando si clicca su un comune apparirà un'avviso con 3 pulsanti: -Scarica: l'app si collegherà online per scaricare il file .pdf in vigore al momento del download N.B. se è presente già un file vecchio dello stesso comune sul telefono, l'app aggiornerà il file presente. -Apri: da usare solamente se è già presente l'appropriato file in memoria. l'app cercherà tutti i lettori di pdf presenti sullo smartphone android e chiederà quale usare per aprire il file, oppure lo aprirà con l'app predefinita dall'utente (se ne è impostata una - Io raccomando Adobe Reader). -Indietro: chiude semplicemente l'avviso. C'è la possibilità di spostare il contenuto dell'app sulla memoria SD esterna, permettendo di occupare meno memoria sul telefono. (da 1,74 MB a 284 KB) I suggerimenti su come migliorare l'app sono sempre apprezzati, mi impegnerò al massimo per venire incontro alle future esigenze. Grazie per aver scaricato questa applicazione. ~Versione 1.1 °Controllo licenza implementato in modo più sicuro. Bisogna essere online al primo avvio dell'app.

description: Ireland’s taxi driver check app is a new service from the National Transport Authority that allows taxi users to verify that the vehicle they are about to hire has been registered correctly and that the driver has the appropriate licence to operate the vehicle. Users can search by the car registration number, the vehicle taxi licence number, the driver licence number or by scanning appropriate QR codes. The current driver and vehicle information can be displayed to help ensure user’s safety. If information is incorrect, it’s possible to submit a report. There is also the facility to email a friend with trip details. Please be advised that personal user data may be compromised through the use of this application on a rooted device Coverage: Ireland’s licenced taxis, hackneys, limos and PSVs are covered by this app including rural locations as well as cities such as Dublin, Cork, Galway, Limerick, and Waterford. Please note, some drivers have yet to register with the checker so they will not appear until such time as they have. Keywords: Taxi, Driver, Check

Play Video poker with your friends! From the creators of Hardwood Spades and Hardwood Solitaire comes Video Poker Duel with a new spin on a classic game. Become an instant video poker master in this traditional "Jacks or better" style game of video poker! Sharpen your skills in single player mode, then go head-to-head with your friends in Challenge Mode for a good ol' fashion duel! “Jacks or better” always starts with a freshly shuffled deck of cards. You will be dealt 5 cards face up. After the first deal, you can choose to keep all of your cards, or exchange the cards you don’t like for new ones. Just select the cards to discard, place your bet, and the dealer takes care of the rest! ★★★★ "This app is a phenomenal way to scratch the betting itch without losing your house. Oh, and it also happens to be pretty fun and is by far the simplest poker game we’ve ever played on mobile." -AndroidAppsReview.com ★★★★★ "Beautiful and addicting. Silver Creek delivers again!" -Chancy S SPECIAL OFFER: Get FREE GEMS when you sign in! In challenge mode you and a friend will start the round with the same amount of chips. You can bet up to 5 chips per hand. The better your hand, the more chips you win! The player with the most chips at the end of each round wins the round AND bonus chips. Use your winnings to make the game your own with deck faces, card backs, backgrounds and more. And don’t forget to show off to your mad skills to your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Google+ with the built-in social features! ★★★★★"Great play, great graphics, and great fun. I love it on my android."-Rich E NEW FEATURES • Achievements, which are shareable on Facebook • New Chip boost power up to extend your game. • New 3D Animations • Two-Player Dual action Mode • Play in either Portrait or Landscape orientation. • Redeem your winnings in the game store for custom upgrades • Built-in social features for easy sharing • Video Poker Duel is also available for iPod, iPad, Kindle and Windows! ** Have suggestions on how to make Video Poker better? We're listening! E-mail us support@silvercrk.com . Make sure to include mention the name of the game, Video Poker duel, and what device you are using.

description: Learn Chinese Mandarin Lite application effectively consolidates knowledge of Chinese characters and pronunciation of words in standard Mandarin. You will learn 25 basic and 10 advanced business phrases with pronunciation, draw Chinese characters with your finger and write sentences using pinyin phonetic transcription. This training is designed for students who already know the elementary basics of Mandarin Chinese. You have 4 difficulty levels and 3 learning and testing modes: 1. Pointing to characters: student see English or hear Chinese sentence and should point Chinese characters for correct translation from random list. 2. Drawing characters: student see English or hear Chinese sentence and should write correct Chinese characters by finger. Can use "HELP" button for see template of correct character. 3. Pointing to Pinyin words: in this mode student should point correct sequence of Pinyin words for Chinese translation. Chinese learning start with learning mode - when you see the phrase in English and hearing speech in Mandarin will be sequentially highlighted signs, to be indicated. Then go training on the following three levels of difficulty. The last level teaches to recognize phrases from the words spoken by a lecturer. In this way, you not only practice spelling but also pronunciation. In application you can purchase additional sentences from different topics. The application is an excellent means of facilitating the preparation for the HSK1 and HSK2 exam of Chinese language. App work off-line.

Sagradas Escrituras (1569) (Biblia del Oso) La Biblia de Casiodoro de Reina; conocida como la "Biblia del Oso" fue publicada en Basilea, Suiza el 28 de Septiembre de 1569. Esta obra tiene la figura de un oso en la portada que está parado junto a un árbol. Esta Biblia está vertida directamente de los textos originales en hebreo y griego. Aparte del texto original y las versiones latinas, al hacer su traducción tuvo Casiodoro de Reina a la vista los trabajos anteriores de Valdés (por ejemplo, sus Salmos en español), de Enzinas, y de Pérez de (la) Pineda, así como la Biblia Ferrariense. En la traducción de 1569 Reina utilizó los últimos adelantos de las ciencias bíblicas. Por ejemplo, usó la división del Nuevo Testamento en versículos, que había sido introducida en forma impresa sólo unos pocos años antes (1550), y lamentó que una nueva publicación Peshita le hubiese llegado demasiado tarde para poder tomarla en cuenta. Esta obra ha sido sometida a muchas revisiones como la del señor Valera amigo de Reina quien hizo la primera revisión y luego muchas otras. La última en 1995 por Sociedades Bíblicas Unidas. Actualmente se conoce como la Biblia Reina-Valera. Bible (1569) (Bear Bible) The New King James Bible, known as the "Bear Bible" was published in Basel, Switzerland on September 28, 1569. This work has the figure of a bear on the cover standing next to a tree. This Bible is poured directly from the original Hebrew and Greek texts. From the original text and the Latin versions, in making its New King James translation had it the previous work of Valdés (eg his Psalms in Spanish) of Enzinas, and Perez (la) Pineda and the Ferrariense Bible. In 1569 the translation of Queen used the latest advances in biblical studies. For example, the division used in the New Testament verses, which had been introduced in print only a few years earlier (1550), and regretted that a new publication Peshitta you had come too late to take it into account. This work has undergone many revisions as Mr. Reina Valera friend who made the first review and then many others. The last in 1995 by United Bible Societies. Currently known as the King James Version.

Are you a fan of jewels-matching games? If the answer is yes, FRUIT JEWELS is the perfect game for you! FRUIT JEWELS is a classic jewels-matching game with many new exciting features, awesome visual effects and special power-ups. Once you start, you can't stop! The orders are in. In this game you run a fruit factory, but not a standard one. You are not selling simple fruits, you are selling fruit jewels. Swap the beautifully designed fruits, match them and create powerful combos. Build your own fruit-licious empire! As the fame of your fruit factory spreads around the world, orders from your clients will become increasingly big and difficult to fulfill. You will need all your skills and expertise to keep delighting your clients and keep growing your business into the ultimate fruit jewels empire. As you progress in the game you will unlock new and exciting game modes. Will you be able to master them all? Unlimited challenging and creative fun! FRUIT JEWELS is a simple but extremely fun match 3 game. It is the ultimate time pass, a glorious explosion of fun and a joy for your eyes. By playing this casual game you will find yourself addicted to swapping the shiny and juicy fruit jewels. The game adds several creative innovations to the popular gem-matching puzzle game genre, with 4 game modes, cool power-ups and challenging objectives. HOW TO PLAY: - Swap jewels to match 3 or more identical jewels and eliminate them - Match more than 3 jewels to activate special power-ups and create devastating combos - Push the chest towards the bottom of the screen to get extra points and reach your objectives faster! GAME FEATURES: - 4 game modes guarantee a great variety of entertaining challenges: FRUIT TIME, FRUIT MOVES, FRUIT TRAIN, FRUIT RELAX - FRUIT TIME: reach the target score before time runs out! - FRUIT MOVES: reach the target score before you run out of moves! - FRUIT TRAIN: a fast paced, thrilling game mode - FRUIT RELAX: Time to enjoy the beautiful graphics and chill out - Amazing power ups that make the game even more exciting - Stunning graphics, fluid animations and gorgeous visual effects - Easy to play, hard to stop! FRUIT JEWELS has lots of great features make the game uniquely interesting and challenging. You will love the fun, creativity and excitement of this great casual game. What are you waiting for? Download FRUIT JEWELS now!

description: Visualize your cell phone’s voice calls, service outages, data speed tests, RF signal strength, coverage map and test your wireless provider's performance! Compare your carrier's coverage to others in your area and create your own personalized mobile coverage map for your Smartphone - FREE! Share the results with friends and your provider and help them improve their network and YOUR wireless experience! MyMobileCoverage℠ Smartphone Application users will be able to: • Map and view the exact locations of voice calls, failed calls and congestion spots • Analyze data on dropped and failed/blocked calls • Measure your data speeds with upload, download, and ping • View the live status of network signal strength and cell sites • Share coverage metrics with your operator to help them improve your coverage! What sets MyMobileCoverage℠ apart from other coverage applications is that we measure and display real coverage from real users, one user at a time and we never interpolate data. Our technology is simply more accurate and we work directly with wireless providers to improve your mobile experience. We are looking for "virtual engineers" to download the application and help drive-test your own wireless network. Uncover coverage deficiencies and help measure the performance of various devices and operating systems. Join the thousands of virtual engineers already helping to improve wireless networks around the world with MyMobileCoverage℠! Supported Devices Android 2.2+ *Some features may not be available on all Android devices. **Some features may not be available on CDMA devices. Visit http://mymobilecoverage.com/support.html for more details. PRIVACY STATEMENT MyMobileCoverage℠ protects your privacy by collecting ONLY coverage information such as voice calls, poor signal quality and data speeds; identifying where on the network the trouble spots exist, sharing that information with users themselves and their primary wireless provider for the purpose of improving their network. We NEVER collect personal information such as any keystrokes, messages, content, or contact lists. For more information about how MyMobileCoverage℠ protects your privacy please review our privacy policy at: http://mymobilecoverage.com/privacypolicy_en.html

No matter how much you travel, keeping track of time zones can be a real problem. With the “RightTimeZone” mobile app for Android, managing call across time zones couldn't be easier. The idea is simple and elegant, by color coding your contacts by availability, you can instantly see if it’s the right time to call or schedule a reminder to call when your contacts are available. Using your device's local time, RightTimeZone automatically updates as you travel. It’s the perfect solution for finding the Right Time Zone to call your personal and professional contacts. Features include: √ Tabs for Locations, People and Meetings. √ A search function to find any time zone easily. √ Simple “red, yellow and green” color coding so you always know the RIGHT TIME to call. √ Ability to schedule meetings based on contact's time zones, or location time zones. √ Easy meeting scheduler allows you to quickly decided the best time for your participants. Regarding your data and privacy: Use of our applications on web and mobile devices requires that you provide certain kinds of information. This information can be provided manually, for example should you enter in a city or location where you'd like to know the current time and time zone. Or the information could be provided automatically, by your installing our mobile applications or your consenting to enabling our web application access to your address book(s). This access is required in order for our system to accurately analyze your contacts' phone numbers or addresses, to assign time zones and estimate the best times for you to schedule calls or meetings with colleagues across the country or around the globe. We don't store your address book data, rather our system periodically accesses your data to ensure contact times are up to date as you move from time zone to time zone. For users of our mobile applications we do, however, store your device's reported location information as a time zone value. Again this is done to ensure the information provided by the application is as accurate as possible. All data is handled securely and is used for no other purpose than to provide the services as described. For more information see our Privacy Policy at http://righttimeapp.com/privacy . Inspired by Leif Clarander
